    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Angel_Skeleton_Effects_54)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Soul Discharge Blue.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call SetTerrainFogExBJ(0, 0.00, 1000.00, 0.50, 0.00, 0.00, 0.00)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Intro_Cinematic_Spawn_Spirit)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Intro_Cinematic_Souls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Intro_Cinematic_Souls=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Intro_Cinematic_Souls, function Trig_Intro_Cinematic_Souls_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Intro Cinematic Spawn Spirit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Intro_Cinematic_Spawn_Spirit_Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Intro_Cinematic_Spawn_Spirit_Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Intro_Cinematic_Spawn_Spirit_Func015001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Intro_Cinematic_Spawn_Spirit_Func020001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Intro_Cinematic_Spawn_Spirit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_026, Player(0), 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Spirit_Region)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Hvwd', Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 359.97)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_Hero=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_HeroTransparency=100.00
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_Hero, 100, 100, 100, 100.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Set_Hero_Transparency)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Intro_Spawn_Souls)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Angel_Skeleton_Effects_23)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Lightning_1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.40)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 100.00, 100.00, 100.00, 0.00)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 3.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 100.00, 100.00, 100.00, 0.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Intro_Cinematic_Spawn_Spirit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Intro_Cinematic_Spawn_Spirit=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Intro_Cinematic_Spawn_Spirit, function Trig_Intro_Cinematic_Spawn_Spirit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Set Hero Transparency
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_Hero_Transparency_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HeroTransparency == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Hero_Transparency_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_HeroTransparency=( udg_HeroTransparency - 1 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_Hero, 100, 100, 100, udg_HeroTransparency)
    if ( Trig_Set_Hero_Transparency_Func003C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Intro_Spawn_Souls)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Intro_Cinematic_Angel_and_Spirit_Dialogue)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Set_Hero_Transparency takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Set_Hero_Transparency=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Set_Hero_Transparency)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Set_Hero_Transparency, 0.05)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Set_Hero_Transparency, function Trig_Set_Hero_Transparency_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Intro Spawn Souls
//
// Default melee game initialization for all players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Intro_Spawn_Souls_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Spirit_Region)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], GetRandomReal(0, 75.00), GetRandomReal(0, 360.00))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\undeaddissipate2.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), GetRandomReal(500.00, 600.00))
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectOrientation(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00, 600.00, 0.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Intro_Spawn_Souls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Intro_Spawn_Souls=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Intro_Spawn_Souls)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Intro_Spawn_Souls, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Intro_Spawn_Souls, function Trig_Intro_Spawn_Souls_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Intro_Cinematic_Angel_and_Spirit_Dialogue_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_396", gg_snd_SS11, "TRIGSTR_397", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 0.10, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif

        return
    else
        call DoNothing()

    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_480", gg_snd_Seraphiel_Intro_12, "TRIGSTR_481", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_482", gg_snd_Seraphiel_Intro_13, "TRIGSTR_483", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.50, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_484", gg_snd_SS16, "TRIGSTR_485", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.50, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_486", gg_snd_Seraphiel_Intro_14, "TRIGSTR_487", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 7.30, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Seraphiel)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Seraphiel, "Spell")
    call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Seraphiel, "stand")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Soul Discharge Blue.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 4.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Hero)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call StopSoundBJ(udg_IntroLoop, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.80)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(GetPlayableMapRect())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_CEAmbience, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetTerrainFogExBJ(0, 200.00, 3250.00, 0.50, 3.92, 0.00, 3.92)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 4.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Seraphiel)
    set udg_Hero=gg_unit_Hvwd_0001
    call ShowUnitHide(udg_Hero)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_033, Player(0), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_034, Player(0), 30.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(6.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero, "Birth")
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LucentBeam1, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\LucentBeamTarget.MDX")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Heal Blue.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[1] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Map_Initialization)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Intro_Cinematic_Angel_and_Spirit_Dialogue takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Intro_Cinematic_Angel_and_Spirit_Dialogue=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Intro_Cinematic_Angel_and_Spirit_Dialogue, function Trig_Intro_Cinematic_Angel_and_Spirit_Dialogue_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skip Intro Kill Switch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SkipCinematic[1] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Hero != gg_unit_Hvwd_0001 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Intro_Enter_region)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Intro_Enter_region_2)
    set udg_SkipCinematic[1]=false
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 3.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call StopSoundBJ(udg_IntroLoop, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Intro_Spawn_Souls)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Set_Hero_Transparency)
    if ( Trig_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch_Func010C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(udg_Hero)
    else
        call ShowUnitShow(udg_Hero)
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(GetPlayableMapRect())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_CEAmbience, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetTerrainFogExBJ(0, 200.00, 3250.00, 0.50, 3.92, 0.00, 3.92)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Seraphiel)
    set udg_Hero=gg_unit_Hvwd_0001
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Map_Initialization)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[1])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[2])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[3])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[4])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[5])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[6])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[7])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[8])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[9])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[10])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[11])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[12])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[13])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[14])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[15])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[16])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[17])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[18])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[19])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[20])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[21])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[22])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[23])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[24])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[25])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[26])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[27])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[28])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[29])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[30])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[31])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[32])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[33])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[34])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[35])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[36])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[37])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[38])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[39])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[40])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[41])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[42])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[43])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[44])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[45])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[46])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[47])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[48])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[49])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[50])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[51])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SkeletonEffect[52])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch, Player(0))
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch, Condition(function Trig_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch, function Trig_Skip_Intro_Kill_Switch_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Make Quests
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Make_Quests_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_521", "TRIGSTR_522", "ReplaceableTextures\\WorldEditUI\\Editor-Random-Unit.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_950", "TRIGSTR_951", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNUndeadShrine.blp")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Make_Quests takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Make_Quests=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Make_Quests, function Trig_Make_Quests_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Preloading
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Preloading_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call Preload("BattlecastGlow.blp")
    call Preload("Flare.blp")
    call Preload("war3mapImported\\LevelupCaster.MDX")
    call Preload("war3mapImported\\Heal.mdx")
    call Preload("war3mapImported\\Shining Flare.mdx")
    call Preload("war3mapImported\\BigBloodEX-NoSplat-NoGutz.mdx")
    call Preload("war3mapImported\\GreenBloodEX.mdx")
    call Preload("war3mapImported\\SmallBloodEX.mdx")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Preloading takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Preloading=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Preloading, 0.00)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Preloading, 1.00)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Preloading, 2.00)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Preloading, Player(0), "preload", true)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Preloading, function Trig_Preloading_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Killing Unit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Killing_Unit_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_BossfightON[1] == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_BossfightON[2] == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Killing_Unit_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Killing_Unit_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Killing_Unit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_NoSickness=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Killing_Unit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Killing_Unit=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Killing_Unit, "udg_LethalDamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Killing_Unit, Condition(function Trig_Killing_Unit_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Killing_Unit, function Trig_Killing_Unit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Dies Play Special Effect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Dies_Play_Special_Effect_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Play_Special_Effect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_HeroArchMageDeath, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_BlowsLeft=0
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A003', udg_Hero)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A004', udg_Hero)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_windwalk, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Conflagrate Blue.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Dies_Play_Special_Effect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Play_Special_Effect=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Play_Special_Effect, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Play_Special_Effect, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Dies_Play_Special_Effect_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Play_Special_Effect, function Trig_Hero_Dies_Play_Special_Effect_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Respawn Initialization
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Respawn_Initialization_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D01P', GetPlayableMapRect())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Respawn_Initialization takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Respawn_Initialization=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Respawn_Initialization, function Trig_Respawn_Initialization_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Set Respawn Region 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_Respawn_Region_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Respawn_Region_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_2)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_3)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_4)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_5)
    set udg_RespawnRegion=gg_rct_Spawn_1
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D01P', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D01O', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D01O', udg_RespawnRegion)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D01P', udg_RespawnRegion)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(udg_RespawnRegion)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\ReversePolarityEffect.MDX")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_windwalk, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_164")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Set_Respawn_Region_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_1, gg_rct_Spawn_1)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_1, Condition(function Trig_Set_Respawn_Region_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_1, function Trig_Set_Respawn_Region_1_Actions)
endfunction

    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D01O', GetPlayableMapRect())

    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_3)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_4)
    set udg_RespawnRegion=gg_rct_Spawn_5
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D01P', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D01O', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D01O', udg_RespawnRegion)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D01P', udg_RespawnRegion)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(udg_RespawnRegion)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\ReversePolarityEffect.MDX")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_windwalk, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_168")
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_5, gg_rct_Spawn_5)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_5, Condition(function Trig_Set_Respawn_Region_5_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Set_Respawn_Region_5, function Trig_Set_Respawn_Region_5_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Respawn Hero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func006002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'uban' )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func006002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u001' )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func006002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'uban'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u001')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func022Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Spawn_5, udg_TempLocation[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func022Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Spawn_4, udg_TempLocation[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func022Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Spawn_3, udg_TempLocation[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func022Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Spawn_2, udg_TempLocation[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Spawn_1, udg_TempLocation[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func028C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_NoSickness == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(udg_Gem[1], udg_Hero)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func002C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(udg_Gem[2], udg_Hero)
    else
    endif
    call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_169")
    call SetUserControlForceOff(GetPlayersAll())
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func006002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_TempRegion), function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func007A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(udg_RespawnRegion)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 1.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call SetUserControlForceOn(GetPlayersAll())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(udg_RespawnRegion)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LucentBeam1, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\LucentBeamTarget.MDX")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Heal Blue.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call ReviveHeroLoc(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], false)
    if ( Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func022C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    else
        if ( Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func022Func001C() ) then
            call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
        else
            if ( Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func022Func001Func001C() ) then
                call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
            else
                if ( Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func022Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func022Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero, "birth")
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(udg_Hero, 0.00)
    if ( Trig_Respawn_Hero_Func028C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00N', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00K', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "innerfire", udg_Hero)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero)
    set udg_NoSickness=false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Respawn_Hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Respawn_Hero=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Respawn_Hero, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Respawn_Hero, Condition(function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Respawn_Hero, function Trig_Respawn_Hero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Subtract Mana
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Subtract_Mana_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Hero, 'B000') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_CinematicON == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Subtract_Mana_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Hero, 'B001') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Subtract_Mana_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Hero, 'B001') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Subtract_Mana_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I007') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Subtract_Mana_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Subtract_Mana_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Subtract_Mana_Func003Func002C() ) then
            call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Hero) - 1 ))
        else
            call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Hero) - 0.50 ))
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_Subtract_Mana_Func003Func001C() ) then
            call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Hero) - 2.00 ))
        else
            call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Hero) - 1 ))
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Subtract_Mana takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Subtract_Mana=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Subtract_Mana, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Subtract_Mana, Condition(function Trig_Subtract_Mana_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Subtract_Mana, function Trig_Subtract_Mana_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Death Souls
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Death_Souls_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'uban' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Death_Souls_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Shade_Death, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h004', Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Death_Souls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Souls=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Souls, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Souls, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Death_Souls_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Souls, function Trig_Spawn_Death_Souls_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Life Souls
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Life_Souls_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Shade_Death, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00C', Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pick Up Soul Auto
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func004Func002Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I00G') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func004Func002C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Soul Discharge Blue.mdx")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        if ( Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func004Func002Func005C() ) then
            call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Hero) + 20.00 ))
        else
            call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Hero) + 15.00 ))
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func008Func002Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I005') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func008Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func008Func002C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Soul Discharge Blue.mdx")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        if ( Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func008Func002Func005C() ) then
            call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Hero) + 75.00 ))
            set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
            call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_973", udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, 10.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 250.00, 90.00)
            call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
            call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
            call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 0.50)
        else
            call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Hero) + 65.00 ))
            set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
            call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_974", udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, 10.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 250.00, 90.00)
            call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
            call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
            call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 0.50)
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempUnitType='h004'
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsOfType(udg_TempUnitType)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func004A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempUnitType='h00C'
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsOfType(udg_TempUnitType)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Func008A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto, 0.05)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto, Condition(function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto, function Trig_Pick_Up_Soul_Auto_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove Dead Souls
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_Dead_Souls_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h004' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00C' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Dead_Souls_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Remove_Dead_Souls_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Dead_Souls_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remove_Dead_Souls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Souls=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Souls, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Souls, Condition(function Trig_Remove_Dead_Souls_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Souls, function Trig_Remove_Dead_Souls_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Show Movement Dialog
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Show_Movement_Dialog_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_Movement_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_977")
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_Movement_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_978")
    set udg_Movement_Dialog_ButtonYes=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_Movement_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_979")
    call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_Movement_Dialog, Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Show_Movement_Dialog takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Show_Movement_Dialog=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Show_Movement_Dialog, Player(0), "movement", true)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Show_Movement_Dialog, function Trig_Show_Movement_Dialog_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Click Movement Dialog
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Click_Movement_Dialog_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_Movement_Dialog_ButtonYes ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Click_Movement_Dialog_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerExecCount(GetTriggeringTrigger()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Click_Movement_Dialog_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Click_Movement_Dialog_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ARPG_Movement=false
    else
        set udg_ARPG_Movement=true
    endif
    call DialogClearBJ(udg_Movement_Dialog)
    if ( Trig_Click_Movement_Dialog_Func003C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_980")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Click_Movement_Dialog takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Click_Movement_Dialog=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Click_Movement_Dialog, udg_Movement_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Click_Movement_Dialog, function Trig_Click_Movement_Dialog_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mouse Movement Configuration
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mouse_Movement_Configuration_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableDragSelect(false, false)
    call EnablePreSelect(false, true)
    call EnableSelect(false, false)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mouse_Movement_Configuration takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mouse_Movement_Configuration=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mouse_Movement_Configuration, function Trig_Mouse_Movement_Configuration_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mouse Click
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mouse_Click_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetTriggerPlayerMouseButton() == MOUSE_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_ARPG_Movement == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Click_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MouseClick=true
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=BlzGetTriggerPlayerMousePosition()
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Hero, "move", udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mouse_Click takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mouse_Click=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerMouseEventBJ(gg_trg_Mouse_Click, Player(0), bj_MOUSEEVENTTYPE_DOWN)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mouse_Click, Condition(function Trig_Mouse_Click_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mouse_Click, function Trig_Mouse_Click_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mouse Release
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mouse_Release_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetTriggerPlayerMouseButton() == MOUSE_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_ARPG_Movement == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Release_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MouseClick=false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mouse_Release takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mouse_Release=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerMouseEventBJ(gg_trg_Mouse_Release, Player(0), bj_MOUSEEVENTTYPE_UP)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mouse_Release, Condition(function Trig_Mouse_Release_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mouse_Release, function Trig_Mouse_Release_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mouse Move
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mouse_Move_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MouseClick == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_ARPG_Movement == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Move_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=BlzGetTriggerPlayerMousePosition()
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Hero, "move", udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Mouse_Move=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerMouseEventBJ(gg_trg_Mouse_Move, Player(0), bj_MOUSEEVENTTYPE_MOVE)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mouse_Move, Condition(function Trig_Mouse_Move_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mouse_Move, function Trig_Mouse_Move_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Disable Movement
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Disable_Movement_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Click)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Move)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Release)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Disable_Movement takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Disable_Movement=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Disable_Movement, function Trig_Disable_Movement_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Enable Movement
//===========================================================================

    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Click)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Move)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Release)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Enable_Movement, function Trig_Enable_Movement_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove Grand Souls
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_Grand_Souls_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Grand_Souls_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call RemoveItem(GetManipulatedItem())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remove_Grand_Souls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remove_Grand_Souls=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_Grand_Souls, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_Grand_Souls, Condition(function Trig_Remove_Grand_Souls_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Grand_Souls, function Trig_Remove_Grand_Souls_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pick Up Grand Souls
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_GrandSoul[1] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_GrandSoul[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_GrandSoul[3] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_GrandSoul[4] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Func007C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Func006Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_GrandSoul[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Func006Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_GrandSoul[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_GrandSoul[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_GrandSoul[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Heal Blue.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    if ( Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Func006C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A002', udg_Hero)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_SECRET, "TRIGSTR_345")
    else
        if ( Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A012', udg_Hero)
            call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_SECRET, "TRIGSTR_346")
        else
            if ( Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A005', udg_Hero)
                call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_SECRET, "TRIGSTR_347")
            else
                if ( Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Func006Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A000', udg_Hero)
                    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_SECRET, "TRIGSTR_348")
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls, Condition(function Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls, function Trig_Pick_Up_Grand_Souls_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SW Initiate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SW_Initiate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Initiate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 3.00)
    set udg_SW_Speed=20.00
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Angle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 130.00, udg_Angle)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Eclipse1, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    // ---
    call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Hero) - 5.00 ))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], udg_Angle)
    set udg_SW_Unit[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hfoo', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], udg_Angle)
    set udg_SW_Unit[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], ( udg_Angle + 20.00 ))
    set udg_SW_Unit[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hfoo', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], ( udg_Angle + 20.00 ))
    set udg_SW_Unit[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], ( udg_Angle - 20.00 ))
    set udg_SW_Unit[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hfoo', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], ( udg_Angle - 20.00 ))
    set udg_SW_Unit[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_SW_Move_Units)
    call PolledWait(2.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_SW_Move_Units)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_SW_Unit[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_SW_Unit[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_SW_Unit[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_SW_Unit[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_SW_Unit[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_SW_Unit[6])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SW_Initiate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SW_Initiate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_SW_Initiate, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_SW_Initiate, Condition(function Trig_SW_Initiate_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SW_Initiate, function Trig_SW_Initiate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SW Move Units
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func005Func001Func004Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I00H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func005Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_HandsGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_Clones) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func005Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), 10.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\ManaBreakTarget.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        if ( Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func005Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Knockback2DTime=0.90
            if ( Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func005Func001Func004Func017C() ) then
                set udg_Knockback2DDistance=215.00
            else
                set udg_Knockback2DDistance=175.00
            endif
            set udg_Knockback2DCollision=0.00
            set udg_Knockback2DHeight=0.00
            set udg_Knockback2DPause=false
            set udg_Knockback2DBounces=false
            set udg_CenterPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_SW_Unit[4])
            set udg_TargetPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
            set udg_Knockback2DAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_CenterPoint, udg_TargetPoint)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_CenterPoint)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TargetPoint)
            set udg_Knockback2DUnit=GetEnumUnit()
            set udg_Knockback2DSource=udg_SW_Unit[4]
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Knockback_2D)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func013002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func013002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func013002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func013002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func013002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func014Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_HandsGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_Clones) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func014Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func014Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), 10.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\ManaBreakTarget.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        if ( Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func014Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Knockback2DTime=0.90
            set udg_Knockback2DDistance=175.00
            set udg_Knockback2DCollision=0.00
            set udg_Knockback2DHeight=0.00
            set udg_Knockback2DPause=false
            set udg_Knockback2DBounces=false
            set udg_CenterPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_SW_Unit[5])
            set udg_TargetPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
            set udg_Knockback2DAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_CenterPoint, udg_TargetPoint)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_CenterPoint)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TargetPoint)
            set udg_Knockback2DUnit=GetEnumUnit()
            set udg_Knockback2DSource=udg_SW_Unit[5]
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Knockback_2D)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
