endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func023Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_HandsGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_Clones) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func023Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func023A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func023Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), 10.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\ManaBreakTarget.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        if ( Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func023Func001Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Knockback2DTime=0.90
            set udg_Knockback2DDistance=175.00
            set udg_Knockback2DCollision=0.00
            set udg_Knockback2DHeight=0.00
            set udg_Knockback2DPause=false
            set udg_Knockback2DBounces=false
            set udg_CenterPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_SW_Unit[6])
            set udg_TargetPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
            set udg_Knockback2DAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_CenterPoint, udg_TargetPoint)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_CenterPoint)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TargetPoint)
            set udg_Knockback2DUnit=GetEnumUnit()
            set udg_Knockback2DSource=udg_SW_Unit[6]
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Knockback_2D)
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_SW_Unit[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_SW_Speed, GetUnitFacing(udg_SW_Unit[1]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_SW_Unit[1], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_SW_Unit[1]))
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[2], Condition(function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func004002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_SW_Unit[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_SW_Speed, GetUnitFacing(udg_SW_Unit[2]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_SW_Unit[2], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_SW_Unit[2]))
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[2], Condition(function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func013002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func014A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_SW_Unit[3])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_SW_Speed, GetUnitFacing(udg_SW_Unit[3]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_SW_Unit[3], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_SW_Unit[3]))
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[2], Condition(function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func022002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Func023A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    // -----
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SW_Move_Units takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SW_Move_Units=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_SW_Move_Units)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_SW_Move_Units, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SW_Move_Units, function Trig_SW_Move_Units_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turn on Cleave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turn_on_Cleave_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Turn_on_Cleave_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I00H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Turn_on_Cleave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Turn_on_Cleave_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_BlowsLeft=8
    else
        set udg_BlowsLeft=6
    endif
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A003', udg_Hero)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A004', udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_death_pact_cast, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Hero) - 5.00 ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    set udg_BlowsLeft=0
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A003', udg_Hero)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A004', udg_Hero)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Turn_on_Cleave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Turn_on_Cleave=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Turn_on_Cleave, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Turn_on_Cleave, Condition(function Trig_Turn_on_Cleave_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Turn_on_Cleave, function Trig_Turn_on_Cleave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cleave Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventSource == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_IsDamageMelee == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_BlowsLeft > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BlowsLeft == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func038002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func038002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func038002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != udg_DamageEventTarget )
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func038002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_DamageEventTarget)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func038002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_DamageEventTarget)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func039Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_HandsGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_Clones) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func039A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), ( udg_DamageEventAmount * 0.50 ), ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\ManaBreakTarget.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func039Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Knockback2DTime=0.90
        set udg_Knockback2DDistance=100.00
        set udg_Knockback2DCollision=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DHeight=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DPause=false
        set udg_Knockback2DBounces=false
        set udg_CenterPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        set udg_TargetPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_Knockback2DAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_CenterPoint, udg_TargetPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_CenterPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TargetPoint)
        set udg_Knockback2DDistance=100.00
        set udg_Knockback2DUnit=GetEnumUnit()
        set udg_Knockback2DSource=udg_Hero
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Knockback_2D)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func042002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func042002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func042002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != udg_DamageEventTarget )
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func042002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_DamageEventTarget)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func042002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_DamageEventTarget)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func043Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_HandsGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_Clones) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func043A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), ( udg_DamageEventAmount * 0.50 ), ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\ManaBreakTarget.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func043Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Knockback2DTime=0.90
        set udg_Knockback2DDistance=100.00
        set udg_Knockback2DCollision=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DHeight=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DPause=false
        set udg_Knockback2DBounces=false
        set udg_CenterPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        set udg_TargetPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_Knockback2DAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_CenterPoint, udg_TargetPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_CenterPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TargetPoint)
        set udg_Knockback2DUnit=GetEnumUnit()
        set udg_Knockback2DSource=udg_Hero
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Knockback_2D)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func046002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func046002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func046002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != udg_DamageEventTarget )
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func046002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_DamageEventTarget)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func046002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != udg_DamageEventTarget)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func047Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_HandsGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_Clones) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func047A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), ( udg_DamageEventAmount * 0.50 ), ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\ManaBreakTarget.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func047Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Knockback2DTime=0.90
        set udg_Knockback2DDistance=100.00
        set udg_Knockback2DCollision=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DHeight=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DPause=false
        set udg_Knockback2DBounces=false
        set udg_CenterPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        set udg_TargetPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_Knockback2DAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_CenterPoint, udg_TargetPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_CenterPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TargetPoint)
        set udg_Knockback2DUnit=GetEnumUnit()
        set udg_Knockback2DSource=udg_Hero
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Knockback_2D)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BlowsLeft=( udg_BlowsLeft - 1 )
    if ( Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func002C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('BOwk', udg_Hero)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A004', udg_Hero)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A003', udg_Hero)
    else
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 160.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_Angle=( GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero) + 180.00 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\EmpowerCleave.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectYaw(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), Deg2Rad(udg_Angle))
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    // -----------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 160.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero) - 30.00 ))
    set udg_Angle=( GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero) + 150.00 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\EmpowerCleave.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectYaw(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), Deg2Rad(udg_Angle))
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    // -----------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 160.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero) + 30.00 ))
    set udg_Angle=( GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero) + 210.00 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\EmpowerCleave.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectYaw(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), Deg2Rad(udg_Angle))
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    // Deal Damage
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 3)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 160.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 160.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero) + 30.00 ))
    set udg_TempLocation[4]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 160.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero) - 30.00 ))
    // -----------
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(100.00, udg_TempLocation[2], Condition(function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func038002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func039A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    // -----------
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(100.00, udg_TempLocation[3], Condition(function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func042002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func043A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    // -----------
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(100.00, udg_TempLocation[4], Condition(function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func046002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Func047A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    // -----------
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cleave_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cleave_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Cleave_Damage, "udg_DamageModifierEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cleave_Damage, Condition(function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cleave_Damage, function Trig_Cleave_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Charge
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Charge_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A012' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I00H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Configuration
    call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('Beng', udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    if ( Trig_Charge_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_ChargeDistance=800.00
    else
        set udg_ChargeDistance=600.00
    endif
    set udg_ChargeAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2])
    // Initiate
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Hero, "war3mapImported\\Valiant Charge Royal BIGGER.mdx")
    set udg_ChargeSFX=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call BlzPlaySpecialEffect(udg_ChargeSFX, ANIM_TYPE_BIRTH)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Hit_Unit)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Move)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Hero) + 10.00 ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Charge takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Charge=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Charge, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Charge, Condition(function Trig_Charge_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Charge, function Trig_Charge_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Charge Move
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Charge_Move_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DashInterrupted[udg_AbilityIndexer] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Move_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ChargeDistance <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Move_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 14.00, udg_ChargeAngle)
    set udg_ChargeDistance=( udg_ChargeDistance - 14.00 )
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[2])
    if ( Trig_Charge_Move_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_DashInterrupted[udg_AbilityIndexer]=false
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_ChargeSFX)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Move)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Hit_Unit)
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Charge_Move_Func006C() ) then
        call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero)
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_ChargeSFX)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Move)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Hit_Unit)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Charge_Move takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Charge_Move=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Move)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Charge_Move, 0.01)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Charge_Move, function Trig_Charge_Move_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Charge Hit Unit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_BossfightON[2] == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ArmageddonBoolean == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() == udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() == udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_EndorBeam == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() == udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_ArmageddonBoolean == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func015002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func015002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func015002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func015002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func015002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func016Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_ChargePicked ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_HandsGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func016A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func016Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Knockback2DTime=0.90
        set udg_Knockback2DDistance=100.00
        set udg_Knockback2DCollision=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DHeight=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DPause=false
        set udg_Knockback2DBounces=false
        set udg_CenterPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_ChargePicked)
        set udg_TargetPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_Knockback2DAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_CenterPoint, udg_TargetPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_CenterPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TargetPoint)
        set udg_Knockback2DDistance=100.00
        set udg_Knockback2DUnit=GetEnumUnit()
        set udg_Knockback2DSource=udg_ChargePicked
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Knockback_2D)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_ChargePicked) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(udg_ChargePicked, GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(udg_ChargePicked, UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(udg_ChargePicked, UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_ChargePicked) != 'u001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_ChargePicked) != 'uban' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ChargePicked=GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        if ( Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func002C() ) then
            set udg_ArmageddonBoolean=false
            set udg_ChargeHitBoss=true
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Meteors)
            call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_LB_ArmageddonTimer)
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[4])
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Stand Alternate")
            call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[4], 50.00)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_LB_ArmageddonEffect)
        else
            if ( Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                set udg_EndorBeam=false
                call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam)
                call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage)
                call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit)
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[1])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[2])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[3])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[4])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[5])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[6])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[7])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[8])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LaerUnitWE)
                call StopSoundBJ(udg_LaserLoopSound, true)
                set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
                call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_AstralimprisonEnd, 30.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
                call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[2], 100)
                call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Bosses[2], "stand")
            else
                if ( Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call StartTimerBJ(udg_DC_SpellTimer, false, 4.00)
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
        call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), 10.00)
        set udg_TempLocation[5]=GetUnitLoc(udg_ChargePicked)
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, udg_ChargePicked, udg_QuickMaths, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGIC)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero)
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_ChargeSFX)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Move)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[5], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Charge_Bam, 60.00, udg_TempLocation[5], 0)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A009', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", udg_ChargePicked)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set udg_TempGroup2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_TempLocation[5], Condition(function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func015002003))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup2, function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006Func002Func016A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup2)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ChargeHitBoss == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[4]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[3], 80.00, AngleBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[3], udg_ChargePoint))
    if ( Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(120.00, udg_TempLocation[4])
    else
        set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(100.00, udg_TempLocation[4])
    endif
    set udg_QuickMaths=100.00
    if ( Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func005C() ) then
        call KillSoundWhenDoneBJ(udg_LB_MeteorLoop)
    else
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func006A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero))
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    if ( Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Func013C() ) then
        set udg_ChargeHitBoss=false
        call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4])
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[4])
        call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('BPSE', udg_Bosses[4])
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[4], 100.00)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Charge_Hit_Unit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Charge_Hit_Unit=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Hit_Unit)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Charge_Hit_Unit, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Charge_Hit_Unit, function Trig_Charge_Hit_Unit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Charge Hero Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Charge_Hero_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Hero_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Move)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Charge_Hit_Unit)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_ChargeSFX)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Charge_Hero_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Charge_Hero_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Charge_Hero_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Charge_Hero_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Charge_Hero_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Charge_Hero_Dies, function Trig_Charge_Hero_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Beam Initiate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Beam_Initiate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetIssuedOrderIdBJ() == String2OrderIdBJ("immolation") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Initiate_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'ratf') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Initiate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Click)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Release)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Move)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Hero, "stop")
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero, "Spell Chain")
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A006', udg_Hero)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Abun', udg_Hero)
    call BlzUnitDisableAbility(udg_Hero, 'A000', true, false)
    call BlzUnitDisableAbility(udg_Hero, 'A002', true, false)
    call BlzUnitDisableAbility(udg_Hero, 'A001', true, false)
    call BlzUnitDisableAbility(udg_Hero, 'A012', true, false)
    if ( Trig_Beam_Initiate_Func015C() ) then
        set udg_LaserBeamDamage=14.00
    else
        set udg_LaserBeamDamage=7.00
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    set udg_LaserBeamON=true
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 2.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Shaking_Effect)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[4]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[5]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[6]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[7]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[8]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[9]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_ShockWaveBirth1, 30.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Laser_Loop, 30.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    set udg_LaserLoopSound=GetLastPlayedSound()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero) - 90.00 ))
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[4], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[5], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[6], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[7], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[8], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[7]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[9], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[8]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[6])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[7])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[8])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[9])
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Hero, 0.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Hero, "immolation")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Beam)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Hero_Face_Angle)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Beam_Disable)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Beam_Damage)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Beam_Initiate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Beam_Initiate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Beam_Initiate, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Beam_Initiate, Condition(function Trig_Beam_Initiate_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Beam_Initiate, function Trig_Beam_Initiate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Beam No Mana
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Beam_No_Mana_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_LaserBeamON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Beam_Disable) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_No_Mana_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Hero, "unimmolation")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Beam_No_Mana takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Beam_No_Mana=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitManaEvent(gg_trg_Beam_No_Mana, gg_unit_Hvwd_0001, LESS_THAN, 5.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Beam_No_Mana, Condition(function Trig_Beam_No_Mana_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Beam_No_Mana, function Trig_Beam_No_Mana_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_LaserBeamON == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Beam_Disable) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Hero, "unimmolation")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Hero_Dies, "udg_LethalDamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Dies, function Trig_Hero_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Beam Disable
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Beam_Disable_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetIssuedOrderIdBJ() == String2OrderIdBJ("unimmolation") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Disable_Func034C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Disable_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Shaking_Effect)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Hero, 100.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Beam_Damage)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Beam)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Hero_Face_Angle)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Click)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Release)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_Move)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[7])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[8])
    call StopSoundBJ(udg_LaserLoopSound, true)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_AstralimprisonEnd, 30.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call BlzUnitDisableAbility(udg_Hero, 'A000', false, false)
    call BlzUnitDisableAbility(udg_Hero, 'A002', false, false)
    call BlzUnitDisableAbility(udg_Hero, 'A001', false, false)
    call BlzUnitDisableAbility(udg_Hero, 'A012', false, false)
    set udg_LaserBeamON=false
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Abun', udg_Hero)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Beam_Initiate)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A006', udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Beam_Disable_Func034C() ) then
        call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Beam_Disable takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Beam_Disable=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Beam_Disable)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Beam_Disable, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Beam_Disable, Condition(function Trig_Beam_Disable_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Beam_Disable, function Trig_Beam_Disable_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Beam
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Beam_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[4]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[5]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[6]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[7]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[8]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    set udg_TempLocation[9]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[1], udg_TempLocation[2], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero) - 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[2], udg_TempLocation[3], GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[3], udg_TempLocation[4], GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[4], udg_TempLocation[5], GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[5], udg_TempLocation[6], GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[6], udg_TempLocation[7], GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[7], udg_TempLocation[8], GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[8], udg_TempLocation[9], GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[6])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[7])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[8])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[9])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Beam takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Beam=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Beam)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Move_Beam, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Beam, function Trig_Move_Beam_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Face Angle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Face_Angle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=BlzGetTriggerPlayerMousePosition()
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[2], AngleBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[1]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Face_Angle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Face_Angle=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Hero_Face_Angle)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerMouseEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Face_Angle, Player(0), bj_MOUSEEVENTTYPE_MOVE)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Face_Angle, function Trig_Hero_Face_Angle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Beam Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func002002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func002002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I00H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'Bslo') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), udg_LaserBeamDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Beam_Damage_Func003Func004C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00N', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Aslo', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "slow", GetEnumUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func007002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func007002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func007002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func007002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func007002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func007002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func007002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func007002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func007002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func008Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I00H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'Bslo') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), udg_LaserBeamDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Beam_Damage_Func008Func004C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00N', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Aslo', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "slow", GetEnumUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func012002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction
