        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func033A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), udg_LaserBeamDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Beam_Damage_Func033Func004C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00N', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Aslo', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "slow", GetEnumUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func037002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func037002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func037002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func037002003002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func037002003002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func037002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func037002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func037002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func037002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func038Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I00H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'Bslo') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func038A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), udg_LaserBeamDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Beam_Damage_Func038Func004C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00N', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Aslo', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "slow", GetEnumUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Beam_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[1])
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func003A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[2])
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func007002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func008A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[3])
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func012002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func013A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[4])
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func017002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func018A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[5])
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func022002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func023A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[6])
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func027002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func028A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[7])
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func032002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func033A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[8])
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(75.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func037002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Beam_Damage_Func038A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Beam_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Beam_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Beam_Damage)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Beam_Damage, 0.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Beam_Damage, function Trig_Beam_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shaking Effect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shaking_Effect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 3.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 1.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shaking_Effect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shaking_Effect=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Shaking_Effect)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Shaking_Effect, 0.60)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shaking_Effect, function Trig_Shaking_Effect_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Slam Spell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Slam_Spell_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true), (BlzIsUnitInvulnerable(GetFilterUnit()) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I00H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func011Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) <= 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func011Func003Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I00H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func011Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), 400.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    if ( Trig_Slam_Spell_Func011Func002C() ) then
        call SetUnitExplodedBJ(GetEnumUnit(), true)
        call ExplodeUnitBJ(GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Slam_Spell_Func011Func003C() ) then
        set udg_CenterPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        set udg_Knockback2DTime=0.90
        if ( Trig_Slam_Spell_Func011Func003Func016C() ) then
            set udg_Knockback2DDistance=550.00
        else
            set udg_Knockback2DDistance=400.00
        endif
        set udg_Knockback2DCollision=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DHeight=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DPause=false
        set udg_Knockback2DSource=udg_Hero
        set udg_Knockback2DBounces=false
        set udg_Knockback2DUnit=GetEnumUnit()
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\ManaBreakTarget.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_TargetPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Knockback2DUnit)
        set udg_Knockback2DAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_CenterPoint, udg_TargetPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_CenterPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TargetPoint)
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Knockback_2D)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Spell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_Hero, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Hero) - 10.00 ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_SlamExplode=true
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_EclipseImpact, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 15.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\SanityEclipse.MDX")
    if ( Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009C() ) then
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.40)
        set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(500.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func002002003))
    else
        set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func009Func003002003))
    endif
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Slam_Spell_Func011A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_SlamExplode=false
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Slam_Spell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Slam_Spell=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Slam_Spell, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Slam_Spell, Condition(function Trig_Slam_Spell_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Slam_Spell, function Trig_Slam_Spell_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Slam Explode
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Slam_Explode_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SlamExplode == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventTarget) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slam_Explode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitExplodedBJ(udg_DamageEventTarget, true)
    call ExplodeUnitBJ(udg_DamageEventTarget)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Slam_Explode takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Slam_Explode=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Slam_Explode, "udg_LethalDamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Slam_Explode, Condition(function Trig_Slam_Explode_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Slam_Explode, function Trig_Slam_Explode_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dagger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dagger_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dagger_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
    call CreateItemLoc('I009', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dagger, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dagger, Condition(function Trig_Dagger_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dagger, function Trig_Dagger_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chest 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chest_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_171)
    call CreateItemLoc('pghe', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(GetPlayableMapRect()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Other\\ToonBoom\\ToonBoom.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_170)
    call CreateItemLoc('I00F', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chest_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chest_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent(gg_trg_Chest_1, gg_dest_B000_2994)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chest_1, function Trig_Chest_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chest 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chest_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_230)
    call CreateItemLoc('I006', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_242)
    call CreateItemLoc('I00B', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chest_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chest_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent(gg_trg_Chest_2, gg_dest_B000_3545)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chest_2, function Trig_Chest_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chest 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chest_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_231)
    call CreateItemLoc('I00E', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chest_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chest_3=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent(gg_trg_Chest_3, gg_dest_B000_5052)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chest_3, function Trig_Chest_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chest trap 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chest_trap_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetDestructableLoc(GetDyingDestructable())
    call RemoveDestructable(GetDyingDestructable())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00V', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_Hero)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chest_trap_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chest_trap_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDeathEvent(gg_trg_Chest_trap_1, gg_dest_B000_5053)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chest_trap_1, function Trig_Chest_trap_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wand of Belphegor Pick up
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wand_of_Belphegor_Pick_up_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wand_of_Belphegor_Pick_up_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempRegion=RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, 300.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_TempRegion)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00U', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[2], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    set udg_MovingBlades=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveRect(udg_TempRegion)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_MovingBlades, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Banish\\BanishTarget.mdl")
    set udg_MovingBladesEffect=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Moving_Blades_Move)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wand_of_Belphegor_Pick_up takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wand_of_Belphegor_Pick_up=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wand_of_Belphegor_Pick_up, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wand_of_Belphegor_Pick_up, Condition(function Trig_Wand_of_Belphegor_Pick_up_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wand_of_Belphegor_Pick_up, function Trig_Wand_of_Belphegor_Pick_up_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wand of Belphegor Drop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wand_of_Belphegor_Drop_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wand_of_Belphegor_Drop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(udg_MovingBlades)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_MovingBladesEffect)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Moving_Blades_Move)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wand_of_Belphegor_Drop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wand_of_Belphegor_Drop=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wand_of_Belphegor_Drop, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DROP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wand_of_Belphegor_Drop, Condition(function Trig_Wand_of_Belphegor_Drop_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wand_of_Belphegor_Drop, function Trig_Wand_of_Belphegor_Drop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Moving Blades Move
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Moving_Blades_Move_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I00I') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moving_Blades_Move_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) > 800.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moving_Blades_Move_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) >= 400.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) < 800.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moving_Blades_Move_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempRegion=RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, 600.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_TempRegion)
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_MovingBlades)
    if ( Trig_Moving_Blades_Move_Func005C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_MovingBlades, "attack", udg_TempLocation[2])
    else
        if ( Trig_Moving_Blades_Move_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_MovingBlades, "move", udg_TempLocation[2])
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveRect(udg_TempRegion)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Moving_Blades_Move takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Moving_Blades_Move=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Moving_Blades_Move)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Moving_Blades_Move, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Moving_Blades_Move, Condition(function Trig_Moving_Blades_Move_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Moving_Blades_Move, function Trig_Moving_Blades_Move_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sword of Alastor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_DamageEventSource, 'I00D') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventSource == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomReal(0, 100.00) <= 5.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_IsDamageMelee == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Func006002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Func006002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_DamageEventSource)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_DamageEventSource)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Func007Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_DamageEventTarget ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_HandsGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, GetEnumUnit(), 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    if ( Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Func007Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Knockback2DTime=0.90
        set udg_Knockback2DDistance=200.00
        set udg_Knockback2DCollision=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DHeight=0.00
        set udg_Knockback2DPause=false
        set udg_Knockback2DBounces=false
        set udg_CenterPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        set udg_TargetPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_DamageEventTarget)
        set udg_Knockback2DAngle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_CenterPoint, udg_TargetPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_CenterPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TargetPoint)
        set udg_Knockback2DDistance=100.00
        set udg_Knockback2DUnit=GetEnumUnit()
        set udg_Knockback2DSource=udg_Hero
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Knockback_2D)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_DamageEventTarget)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Shockwave, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Damnation Orange.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, udg_DamageEventTarget, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(150.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Func006002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Func007A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 10.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sword_of_Alastor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sword_of_Alastor=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Sword_of_Alastor, "udg_DamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sword_of_Alastor, Condition(function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sword_of_Alastor, function Trig_Sword_of_Alastor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wing Smite
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wing_Smite_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_DamageEventTarget, 'I005') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_IsDamageSpell == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wing_Smite_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomReal(0, 100.00) <= 5.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wing_Smite_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Wing_Smite_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_DamageEventSource)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Smite.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, udg_DamageEventSource, 150.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 5.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
        call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wing_Smite takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wing_Smite=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Wing_Smite, "udg_DamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wing_Smite, Condition(function Trig_Wing_Smite_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wing_Smite, function Trig_Wing_Smite_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Use Regen Potion
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Use_Regen_Potion_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Use_Regen_Potion_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00N', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00E', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "innerfire", udg_Hero)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Use_Regen_Potion takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Use_Regen_Potion=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Use_Regen_Potion, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Use_Regen_Potion, Condition(function Trig_Use_Regen_Potion_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Use_Regen_Potion, function Trig_Use_Regen_Potion_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove Dummies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_Dummies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Dummies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remove_Dummies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remove_Dummies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_Dummies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_Dummies, Condition(function Trig_Remove_Dummies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Dummies, function Trig_Remove_Dummies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Camera Height 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Camera_Height_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Camera_Height_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(Player(0), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 2000.00, 1.00)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Camera_Height_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Camera_Height_1, gg_rct_Region_201)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Camera_Height_1, Condition(function Trig_Camera_Height_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Camera_Height_1, function Trig_Camera_Height_1_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Camera_Height_4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Camera_Height_4=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_Camera_Height_4, gg_rct_Region_244)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Camera_Height_4, Condition(function Trig_Camera_Height_4_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Camera_Height_4, function Trig_Camera_Height_4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Open Gate 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Open_Gate_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Open_Gate_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Gate_Region_1)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BattlenetBirth1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("Death Alternate", 'D01Q', gg_rct_Gate_Region_1)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3794)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3795)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3796)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Open_Gate_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Open_Gate_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Open_Gate_1, gg_rct_Spawn_1)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Open_Gate_1, Condition(function Trig_Open_Gate_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Open_Gate_1, function Trig_Open_Gate_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================

    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_GateOpen[1]=true
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Gate_Region_2)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BattlenetBirth1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("Death Alternate", 'D01Q', gg_rct_Gate_Region_2)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3792)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3793)
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Dies Remove Shades
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ShadesGroup, function Trig_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades_Func003A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades, function Trig_Hero_Dies_Remove_Shades_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Death Shades
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Death_Shades_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I002') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Death_Shades_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], GetRandomReal(200.00, 900.00), GetRandomReal(0, 360.00))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'uban', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[2], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_ShadesGroup)
    set udg_TempUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveGuardPosition(udg_TempUnit)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\SoulRitual.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_TempUnit, "attack", udg_Hero)
    call RemoveGuardPosition(udg_TempUnit)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Death_Shades takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades, 8.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Death_Shades_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades, function Trig_Spawn_Death_Shades_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Life Shades
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Life_Shades_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(udg_Hero, 'I001') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Life_Shades_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], GetRandomReal(200.00, 900.00), GetRandomReal(0, 360.00))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[2], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_ShadesGroup)
    set udg_TempUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveGuardPosition(udg_TempUnit)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\SoulRitual.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_TempUnit, "attack", udg_Hero)
    call RemoveGuardPosition(udg_TempUnit)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Life_Shades takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades, 13.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Life_Shades_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades, function Trig_Spawn_Life_Shades_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove Shades
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_Shades_Func001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u001' )
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Shades_Func001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'uban' )
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Shades_Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u001'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'uban')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Shades_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Shades_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Remove_Shades_Func001002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Remove_Shades_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remove_Shades takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remove_Shades=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Shades, function Trig_Remove_Shades_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Skeletons_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Skeleton_Spawn_1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Skeleton_Spawn_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Skeletons 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Skeletons_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Skeletons_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_6)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Skeleton_Spawn_1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_9)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_8)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_7)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_13)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_14)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_11)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_10)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_12)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_221)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_131)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_132)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_134)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_133)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_143)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_153)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_140)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_167)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_166)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_168)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_169)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Post_Boss_7)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Post_Boss_8)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h005', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unpause Units
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unpause_Units_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', GetEnumUnit())
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func005002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', GetEnumUnit())
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func008002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', GetEnumUnit())
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func011002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func012A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', GetEnumUnit())
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func014002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func015A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', GetEnumUnit())
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Unpause_Units_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Spawn_13, Condition(function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func002002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func003A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Spawn_14, Condition(function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func005002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func006A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Spawn_11, Condition(function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func008002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func009A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Spawn_10, Condition(function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func011002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func012A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Spawn_12, Condition(function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func014002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Unpause_Units_Func015A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unpause_Units takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unpause_Units=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Unpause_Units, gg_rct_Unpause_Units_Region_1)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unpause_Units, Condition(function Trig_Unpause_Units_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unpause_Units, function Trig_Unpause_Units_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Ghosts 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Ghosts_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Ghosts_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_130)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_139)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_137)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_138)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_143)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_149)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_150)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_151)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_135)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_136)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Post_Boss_14)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Post_Boss_16)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_217)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostGroup)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Spawn_Ghosts_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Spawn_Ghosts_1, gg_rct_Unpause_Units_Region_1)

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Spiders_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_155)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_154)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_156)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_157)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_159)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_160)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_161)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_162)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_165)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_164)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_158)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n002', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_163)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n002', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Spiders takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Spiders=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spawn_Spiders, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)

endfunction

    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Bombs_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Unit_Spawn_1)

    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_Hero)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_BombGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Unit_Spawn_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_Hero)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_BombGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Unit_Spawn_3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_Hero)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_BombGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Unit_Spawn_4)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_Hero)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_BombGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_219)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_BombGroup)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Post_Boss_11)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_BombGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Shadow Fiends
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Shadow_Fiends_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Shadow_Fiends_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_202)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h007', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_ShadowFiendGroup)
    set udg_VoidFallUnit[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h007', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_ShadowFiendGroup)
    set udg_VoidFallUnit[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_205)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h007', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_ShadowFiendGroup)
    set udg_VoidFallUnit[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_204)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h007', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_ShadowFiendGroup)
    set udg_VoidFallUnit[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_206)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h007', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_ShadowFiendGroup)
    set udg_VoidFallUnit[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_207)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h007', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_ShadowFiendGroup)
    set udg_VoidFallUnit[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_208)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h007', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_ShadowFiendGroup)
    set udg_VoidFallUnit[7]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Shadow_Fiends takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Shadow_Fiends=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spawn_Shadow_Fiends, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Shadow_Fiends, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Shadow_Fiends_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Shadow_Fiends, function Trig_Spawn_Shadow_Fiends_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Ethereal Fiends 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Ethereal_Fiends_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Ethereal_Fiends_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Unit_Spawn_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00T', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_EtherealGroup)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    // ---
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Bomb_Post_Boss_1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00T', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_EtherealGroup)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    // ---
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_209)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00T', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_EtherealGroup)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    // ---
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_168)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00T', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_EtherealGroup)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    set udg_Ethereals[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // ---
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Gem_Region_6)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00T', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_EtherealGroup)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    set udg_Ethereals[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Ethereal_Fiends_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Ethereal_Fiends_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spawn_Ethereal_Fiends_1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Ethereal_Fiends_1, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Ethereal_Fiends_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Ethereal_Fiends_1, function Trig_Spawn_Ethereal_Fiends_1_Actions)
endfunction

    endif

    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_EtherealGroup)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    set udg_Ethereals[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_215)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00T', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_EtherealGroup)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    set udg_Ethereals[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_214)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00T', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_EtherealGroup)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    set udg_Ethereals[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_227)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00T', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_EtherealGroup)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    set udg_Ethereals[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
endfunction

    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_248)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Y', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_249)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Y', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_250)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Y', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Y', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100.00)
endfunction
