//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Units Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Units_Dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h005' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h002' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h007' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00Q' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n002' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n001' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u003' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u001' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u000' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n000' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Units_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Units_Dies_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Units_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Units_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Units_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Units_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Units_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Units_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Units_Dies, function Trig_Units_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skeleton Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skeleton_Dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h005' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h002' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Skeleton_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Skeleton_Dies_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skeleton_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_SkeletonDeath1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Skeleton_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Skeleton_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Skeleton_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Skeleton_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Skeleton_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Skeleton_Dies, function Trig_Skeleton_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc('I00B', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Dies
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BansheeGhostYesAttack2, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Ghost_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ghost_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ghost_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ghost_Dies, function Trig_Ghost_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Cast Projectile
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_Cast_Projectile_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Cast_Projectile_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_GhostGroup) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Cast_Projectile_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_GhostGroup) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Cast_Projectile_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Cast_Projectile_Func002002003))
    set udg_RandomUnit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_TempGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_RandomUnit, "blink", udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_Cast_Projectile takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_Cast_Projectile=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Ghost_Cast_Projectile, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ghost_Cast_Projectile, function Trig_Ghost_Cast_Projectile_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Summon Projectile
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_Summon_Projectile_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Summon_Projectile_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Ghost_Projectile, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_GhostProjectiles)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_Summon_Projectile takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_Summon_Projectile=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ghost_Summon_Projectile, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ghost_Summon_Projectile, Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Summon_Projectile_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ghost_Summon_Projectile, function Trig_Ghost_Summon_Projectile_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Move Projectiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_Move_Projectiles_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_GhostProjectiles) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Move_Projectiles_Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Move_Projectiles_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetEnumUnit(), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    if ( Trig_Ghost_Move_Projectiles_Func001Func005C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Move_Projectiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GhostProjectiles, function Trig_Ghost_Move_Projectiles_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_Move_Projectiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_Move_Projectiles=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Ghost_Move_Projectiles, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ghost_Move_Projectiles, Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Move_Projectiles_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ghost_Move_Projectiles, function Trig_Ghost_Move_Projectiles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Projectile Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_Projectile_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Projectile_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_Projectile_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_Projectile_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ghost_Projectile_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ghost_Projectile_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Projectile_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ghost_Projectile_Dies, function Trig_Ghost_Projectile_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gargoyle Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gargoyle_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Gargoyle_Death_Sound, 50.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\SmallBloodEX.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gargoyle_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gargoyle_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Gargoyle_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gargoyle_Dies, function Trig_Gargoyle_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bomb Explode
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bomb_Explode_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_BombGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bomb_Explode_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 150.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bomb_Explode_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_Bomb_Explode_Func002Func002C() ) then
        call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

function Trig_Bomb_Explode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_BombGroup, function Trig_Bomb_Explode_Func002A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bomb_Explode takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bomb_Explode=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Bomb_Explode, 0.10)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Bomb_Explode, Condition(function Trig_Bomb_Explode_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bomb_Explode, function Trig_Bomb_Explode_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bomb Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bomb_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bomb_Dies_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 250.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bomb_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\DispelMagic\\DispelMagicTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\ToxicField.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\GreenBloodEX.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Bomb_Dies_Func013C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Hero, 200.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call SetUnitExplodedBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call ExplodeUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit())
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_BombGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bomb_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bomb_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Bomb_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Bomb_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Bomb_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bomb_Dies, function Trig_Bomb_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Etheral Fiend Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Etheral_Fiend_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Etheral_Fiend_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_ShadeDeath1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Etheral_Fiend_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Etheral_Fiend_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Etheral_Fiend_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Etheral_Fiend_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Etheral_Fiend_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Etheral_Fiend_Dies, function Trig_Etheral_Fiend_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Create Special Effect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Create_Special_Effect_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_EtherealGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Create_Special_Effect_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Agho', GetEnumUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Create_Special_Effect_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Create_Special_Effect_Func002Func001C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\MoonWell\\MoonWellCasterArt.mdl")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Create_Special_Effect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_EtherealGroup, function Trig_Create_Special_Effect_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Create_Special_Effect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Create_Special_Effect=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Create_Special_Effect, 0.25)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Create_Special_Effect, Condition(function Trig_Create_Special_Effect_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Create_Special_Effect, function Trig_Create_Special_Effect_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Take Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Take_Damage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_DamageEventTarget) == 'h00T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Agho', udg_DamageEventTarget) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Agho', udg_DamageEventTarget)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(udg_DamageEventTarget, GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(udg_DamageEventTarget))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", udg_DamageEventTarget, "war3mapImported\\EnergyBurst.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_DamageEventSource, udg_DamageEventTarget, 200.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Take_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Take_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Take_Damage, "udg_DamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Take_Damage, Condition(function Trig_Take_Damage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Take_Damage, function Trig_Take_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Deal Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Deal_Damage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Agho', udg_DamageEventSource) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Deal_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Agho', udg_DamageEventSource)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", udg_DamageEventTarget, "war3mapImported\\EnergyBurst.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_DamageEventSource, udg_DamageEventTarget, 200.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(udg_DamageEventSource, GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(udg_DamageEventSource))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Deal_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Deal_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Deal_Damage, "udg_DamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Deal_Damage, Condition(function Trig_Deal_Damage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Deal_Damage, function Trig_Deal_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ethereals Attack 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ethereals_Attack_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_Bosses[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ethereals_Attack_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_211)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Ethereals[1], "attack", udg_TempLocation[1])
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Ethereals[2], "attack", udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Ethereals_Attack_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Ethereals_Attack_1, gg_rct_Region_210)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ethereals_Attack_1, Condition(function Trig_Ethereals_Attack_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ethereals_Attack_1, function Trig_Ethereals_Attack_1_Actions)
endfunction

    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Spider_Lord_Death_Sound, 60.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\SmallBloodEX.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spider Lord Cast Spells
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_Bosses[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Hero, 'Beng') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n002' )
endfunction

function Trig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells_Func005Func001C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "impale", udg_TempLocation[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells_Func004002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells, Condition(function Trig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells, function Trig_Spider_Lord_Cast_Spells_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spider Lord Summon Missile
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spider_Lord_Summon_Missile_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spider_Lord_Summon_Missile_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Web_Launch, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_WebMissilesGroup)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spider_Lord_Summon_Missile takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Summon_Missile=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Summon_Missile, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Summon_Missile, Condition(function Trig_Spider_Lord_Summon_Missile_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Summon_Missile, function Trig_Spider_Lord_Summon_Missile_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spider Lord Move Missiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_WebMissilesGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles_Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetEnumUnit(), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    if ( Trig_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles_Func001Func005C() ) then
        call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Web)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
endfunction

function Trig_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_WebMissilesGroup, function Trig_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles, Condition(function Trig_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles, function Trig_Spider_Lord_Move_Missiles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spider Lord Web
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spider_Lord_Web_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Web_Impact, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00N', Player(10), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Aens', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "ensnare", udg_Hero)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spider_Lord_Web takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Web=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Web, function Trig_Spider_Lord_Web_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spider Lord Web Dies
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spider_Lord_Web_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spider_Lord_Web_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Web_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Web_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Web_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Spider_Lord_Web_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spider_Lord_Web_Dies, function Trig_Spider_Lord_Web_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shadow Fiend Dies
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_ObsidianAvengerDeath1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shadow_Fiend_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shadow_Fiend_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Shadow_Fiend_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Shadow_Fiend_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Shadow_Fiend_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shadow_Fiend_Dies, function Trig_Shadow_Fiend_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Void Rain Impact Sound
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\FrostNova\\FrostNovaTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), - 100.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound, function Trig_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shadow Fiend Cast Void Rain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_ShadowFiendGroup) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), udg_ShadowFiendGroup) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain_Func003002003))
    set udg_RandomUnit=GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_TempGroup)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_RandomUnit, "carrionswarm", udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain, Condition(function Trig_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain, function Trig_Shadow_Fiend_Cast_Void_Rain_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Void Rain 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Void_Rain_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_VoidFallUnit[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[1]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_VR_Start, 100, udg_VoidFallLocation_1[1], 0)
    set udg_VoidFallRegion[1]=RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[1], 300.00, 300.00)
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[2]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[2], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[3]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[3], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[4]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[4], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[5]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[5], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[6]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[6], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[7]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[7], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[8]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[8], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[9]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[9], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_1_Damage)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[10]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[10], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[11]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[11], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[12]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[12], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[13]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[13], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[14]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[14], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[15]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[15], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[16]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[16], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rain_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Void_Rain_1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Void_Rain_1, Condition(function Trig_Void_Rain_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_1, function Trig_Void_Rain_1_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_VoidFallLocation_1[2]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 5.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func003C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func009C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func015C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func021C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[5])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func027C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[6])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func033C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[7])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func039C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[8])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func045C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[9])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func051C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[10])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func057C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[11])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func063C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[12])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func069C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[13])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func075C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[14])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func081C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[15])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Func087C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[16])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[1])
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_1_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_1_Damage, function Trig_Void_Rain_1_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Void Rain 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Void_Rain_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_VoidFallUnit[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[17]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_VR_Start, 100, udg_VoidFallLocation_1[17], 0)
    set udg_VoidFallRegion[2]=RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[17], 300.00, 300.00)
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[18]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[18], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[19]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[19], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[20]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[20], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[21]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[21], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[22]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[22], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[23]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[23], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[24]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[24], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[25]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[25], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_2_Damage)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[26]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[26], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[27]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[27], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[28]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[28], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[29]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[29], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[30]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[30], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[31]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[31], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[32]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[2])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[32], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rain_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Void_Rain_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Void_Rain_2, Condition(function Trig_Void_Rain_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_2, function Trig_Void_Rain_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_VoidFallLocation_1[18]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_VoidFallLocation_1[32]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 5.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func003C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[1], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[18])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func009C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[19])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func015C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[20])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func021C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[21])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func027C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[22])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func033C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[23])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func039C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[24])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func045C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[25])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func051C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[26])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func057C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[27])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func063C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[28])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func069C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[29])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func075C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[30])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func081C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[31])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Func087C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[2], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[32])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[17])
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rain_2_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_2_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_2_Damage, function Trig_Void_Rain_2_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Void Rain 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Void_Rain_3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_VoidFallUnit[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[33]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_VR_Start, 100, udg_VoidFallLocation_1[33], 0)
    set udg_VoidFallRegion[3]=RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[33], 300.00, 300.00)
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[34]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[34], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[35]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[35], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[36]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[36], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[37]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[37], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[38]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[38], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[39]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[39], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[40]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[40], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[41]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[41], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_3_Damage)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[42]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[42], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[43]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[43], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[44]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[44], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[45]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[45], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[46]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[46], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[47]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[47], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[48]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[48], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 5.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func003C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[34])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func009C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[35])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func015C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[36])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func021C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[37])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func027C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[38])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func033C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[39])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func039C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[40])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func045C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[41])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func051C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[42])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func057C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[43])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func063C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[44])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func069C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[45])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func075C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[46])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func081C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[47])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Func087C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[48])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[33])
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rain_3_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_3_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_3_Damage, function Trig_Void_Rain_3_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Void Rain 4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Void_Rain_4_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_VoidFallUnit[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[49]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_VR_Start, 100, udg_VoidFallLocation_1[49], 0)
    set udg_VoidFallRegion[4]=RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[49], 300.00, 300.00)
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[50]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[50], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[51]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[51], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[52]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[52], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[53]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[53], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[54]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[54], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[55]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[55], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[56]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[56], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[57]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[57], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_4_Damage)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[58]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[58], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[59]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[59], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[60]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[60], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[61]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[61], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[62]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[62], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[63]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[63], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[64]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[64], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[4], "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rain_4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_4=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Void_Rain_4, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Void_Rain_4, Condition(function Trig_Void_Rain_4_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_4, function Trig_Void_Rain_4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Void Rain 4 Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Void_Rain_4_Damage_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_VoidFallLocation_1[50]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[4], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif

    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])

    else

        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[4], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
