    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_4_Damage_Func075C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[4], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[62])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_4_Damage_Func081C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[4], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[63])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_4_Damage_Func087C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[4], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[64])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[49])
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rain_4_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_4_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_4_Damage, function Trig_Void_Rain_4_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Void Rain 5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Void_Rain_5_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_VoidFallUnit[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[65]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_VR_Start, 100, udg_VoidFallLocation_1[65], 0)
    set udg_VoidFallRegion[5]=RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[65], 300.00, 300.00)
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[66]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[66], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[67]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[67], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[68]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[68], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[69]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[69], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[70]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[70], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[71]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[71], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[72]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[72], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[73]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[73], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_5_Damage)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[74]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[74], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[75]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[75], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[76]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[76], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[77]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[77], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[78]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[78], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[79]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[79], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[80]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[5])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[80], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rain_5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_5=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Void_Rain_5, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Void_Rain_5, Condition(function Trig_Void_Rain_5_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_5, function Trig_Void_Rain_5_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Void Rain 5 Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_VoidFallLocation_1[66]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 5.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Func003C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[66])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Func009C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[67])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Func015C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[68])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Func021C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[69])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Func027C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[70])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Func033C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[71])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Func039C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[72])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)

    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Func045C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[73])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)

    endif

    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)

        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[78])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_5_Damage_Func081C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else

        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[5], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[80])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[65])
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
endfunction

    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true

    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[81]=GetSpellTargetLoc()

    // ---

    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[82]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[6])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[82], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---

    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[83], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")

    // ---

    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())

    // ---

    // ---

    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---

    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[92], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[93]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[6])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[93], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[94]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[6])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[94], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[95]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[6])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[95], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[96]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[6])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[96], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_6=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Void_Rain_6, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Void_Rain_6, Condition(function Trig_Void_Rain_6_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_6, function Trig_Void_Rain_6_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func087C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_VoidFallLocation_1[96]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 5.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func003C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[82])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func009C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[83])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func015C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[84])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func021C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[85])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func027C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[86])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func033C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[87])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func039C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[88])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func045C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[89])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func051C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[90])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func057C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[91])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func063C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[92])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func069C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[93])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func075C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[94])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func081C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[95])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Func087C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[6], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[96])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[81])
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rain_6_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_6_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_6_Damage, function Trig_Void_Rain_6_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Void Rain 7
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Void_Rain_7_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_VoidFallUnit[7] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_7_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[97]=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_VR_Start, 100, udg_VoidFallLocation_1[97], 0)
    set udg_VoidFallRegion[7]=RectFromCenterSizeBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[97], 300.00, 300.00)
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[98]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[98], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[99]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[99], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[100]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[100], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[101]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[101], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[102]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[102], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[103]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[103], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[104]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[104], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[105]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[105], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_7_Damage)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[106]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[106], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[107]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[107], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[108]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[108], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[109]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[109], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[110]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[110], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[111]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[111], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    // ---
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // ---
    set udg_VoidFallLocation_1[112]=GetRandomLocInRect(udg_VoidFallRegion[7])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[112], "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 5.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func003C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[98])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func009C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[99])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func015C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[100])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func021C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[101])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func027C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[102])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func033C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[103])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func039C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[104])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func045C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[105])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func051C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[106])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func057C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[107])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func063C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[108])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func069C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[109])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func075C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[110])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func081C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[111])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Func087C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_VoidFallUnit[7], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[112])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_VoidFallLocation_1[97])
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Void_Rain_Impact_Sound)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rain_7_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rain_7_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rain_7_Damage, function Trig_Void_Rain_7_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lesser Demon Cast Spells
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00Y' )
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Func004Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Func004Func001C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        if ( Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Func004Func001Func002C() ) then
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "roar")
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Func003002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TempGroup, function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Func004A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells, Condition(function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells, function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Cast_Spells_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lesser Demon Slam
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func051C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func061C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func071C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func081C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func091C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func101C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func106C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Lesser_Demon_Spell_Sound, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("right hand", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\TrollBerserk\\TrollBeserkerTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 150.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Wild GrowthEDITED.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 250.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Wild GrowthEDITED.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 350.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Wild GrowthEDITED.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 450.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Wild GrowthEDITED.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 550.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Wild GrowthEDITED.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 650.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Wild GrowthEDITED.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 150.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Impale\\ImpaleMissTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Holy Light VoidSILENT.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func051C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Hero, 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 250.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Impale\\ImpaleMissTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Holy Light VoidSILENT.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func061C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Hero, 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 350.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Impale\\ImpaleMissTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Holy Light VoidSILENT.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func071C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Hero, 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 450.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Impale\\ImpaleMissTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Holy Light VoidSILENT.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func081C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Hero, 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 550.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Impale\\ImpaleMissTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Holy Light VoidSILENT.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func091C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Hero, 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 650.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Impale\\ImpaleMissTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\Holy Light VoidSILENT.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func101C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Hero, 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 10.00)
    if ( Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Func106C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", udg_Hero)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lesser_Demon_Slam takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Slam=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Slam, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Slam, Condition(function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Slam, function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Slam_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lesser Demon Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 50.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Lesser_Demon_Death, 50.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\BigBloodEX-NoSplat-NoGutz.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 150.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UDeathMedium\\UDeath.mdl")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lesser_Demon_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lesser_Demon_Dies, function Trig_Lesser_Demon_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Set Gem Region 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Gem_Region_10, udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Gem_Region_8, udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Gem_Region_10_Copy, udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Gem_Region_6, udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Gem_Region_2, udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_2
    else
        if ( Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_6
        else
            if ( Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_10_Copy
            else
                if ( Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_8
                else
                    if ( Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_10
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Set_Gem_Region_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Set_Gem_Region_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Set_Gem_Region_1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Set_Gem_Region_1, Condition(function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Set_Gem_Region_1, function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_2_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Gem_Region_11, udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Gem_Region_4, udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Gem_Region_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Set_Gem_Region_2_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_4
    else
        if ( Trig_Set_Gem_Region_2_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_7
        else
            if ( Trig_Set_Gem_Region_2_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_9
            else
                if ( Trig_Set_Gem_Region_2_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_11
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pick up Gem of Death Spell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 150.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell_Func002C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(udg_Gem[1], udg_Hero)
    else
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetItemLoc(udg_Gem[1])
        if ( Trig_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call UnitAddItemSwapped(udg_Gem[1], udg_Hero)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell, Condition(function Trig_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell, function Trig_Pick_up_Gem_of_Death_Spell_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pick Up Gems
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pick_Up_Gems_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_Gem[1] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_Gem[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Gems_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) != 'I000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Pick_Up_Gems_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Gems_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_Gem[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Gems_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_Gem[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Up_Gems_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Pick_Up_Gems_Func003C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_185")
        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    else
        if ( Trig_Pick_Up_Gems_Func003Func001C() ) then
            call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], false, 120.00)
            call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], "TRIGSTR_186")
            set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[2]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pick_Up_Gems takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pick_Up_Gems=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Pick_Up_Gems, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pick_Up_Gems, Condition(function Trig_Pick_Up_Gems_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pick_Up_Gems, function Trig_Pick_Up_Gems_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Set Gem Puzzle Variables
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_Gem_Puzzle_Variables_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_1
    set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_5
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Set_Gem_Puzzle_Variables=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Set_Gem_Puzzle_Variables, function Trig_Set_Gem_Puzzle_Variables_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Drop Gem 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Drop_Gem_1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_Gem[1] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_Gem[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Drop_Gem_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Drop_Gem_1_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Drop_Gem_1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetManipulatedItem() == udg_Gem[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Drop_Gem_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_1_Func001C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[1])
        call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1])
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemMoveTimer[1], false, 0.01)
    else
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[2])
        call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[2])
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemMoveTimer[2], false, 0.01)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Drop_Gem_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Drop_Gem_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Drop_Gem_1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DROP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Drop_Gem_1, Condition(function Trig_Drop_Gem_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Drop_Gem_1, function Trig_Drop_Gem_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemMoveTimer[3], false, 0.01)
endfunction

function Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_1, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_2, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_6, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_8, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_10, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_10_Copy, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[1])
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
        call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    else
        if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005C() ) then
                set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_1
                set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
                call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
            else
                if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_2
                    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
                    call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                    if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func006C() ) then
                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Gate_2)
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func001C() ) then
                        if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Gates_1)
                        else
                        endif
                        set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_6
                        set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
                        call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                        set udg_TempLocation[4]=GetItemLoc(udg_Gem[2])
                        if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func001Func008C() ) then
                            if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func001Func008Func001C() ) then
                                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Gate_3)
                            else
                            endif
                        else
                        endif
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                            set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_8
                            set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
                            call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
                                call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
                                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                                set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_10
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func001Func002Func001Func004C() ) then
                                    set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_10
                                    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
                                    call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
                                    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func001Func002Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
                                        set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_FB_Red
                                        set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
                                        call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
                                        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func001Func002Func001Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_10
                                            set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
                                            call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
                                            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Func002Func001Func005Func001Func001Func002Func001Func004Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_10_Copy
                                                set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
                                                call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
                                                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                                            else
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        else
            set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_10
            set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
            call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2, udg_GemMoveTimer[3])
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2, function Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_1_2_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_3, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_4, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_5, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_7, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_9, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Gem_Region_11, udg_TempLocation[1]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[2])
            set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
            call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[2])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        else
            if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001Func005C() ) then
                    set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_3
                    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
                    call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                else
                    if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func001C() ) then
                        if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Gates_2)
                        else
                        endif
                        set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_4
                        set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
                        call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func001Func002C() ) then
                            set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_5
                            set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
                            call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_7
                                set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
                                call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
                                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                                set udg_TempLocation[4]=GetItemLoc(udg_Gem[1])
                                if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func001Func002Func001Func007C() ) then
                                    if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func001Func002Func001Func007Func001C() ) then
                                        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Gate_3)
                                    else
                                    endif
                                else
                                endif
                                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_9
                                    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
                                    call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
                                    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_11
                                        set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
                                        call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
                                        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_FB_Yellow
                                            set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
                                            call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
                                            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
                                        else
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            else
                set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_11
                set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
                call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2, udg_GemMoveTimer[4])
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2, function Trig_Drop_Gem_Run_Trigger_2_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Open Gates 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Open_Gates_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_1307)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_4927)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_4928)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_4929)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_127)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BattlenetBirth1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("Death Alternate", 'D01Q', gg_rct_Region_127)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Open_Gates_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Open_Gates_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Open_Gates_1, function Trig_Open_Gates_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Open Gates 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Open_Gates_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_4933)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpb_4935)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_4934)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_128)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BattlenetBirth1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("Death Alternate", 'D01Q', gg_rct_Region_128)
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Bosses
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Bosses_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Boss_1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o002', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    set udg_Bosses[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[1])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Boss_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h003', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    set udg_Bosses[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[2])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Boss_3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o003', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    set udg_Bosses[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[3])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Final_Boss_Spawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    set udg_Bosses[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[4])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_1_room)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_2_room)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_3_room)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Bosses takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Bosses=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Bosses, function Trig_Spawn_Bosses_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Open Boss 1 room
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Open_Boss_1_room_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3813)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3814)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3815)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3816)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3817)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("Death Alternate", 'D01Q', gg_rct_Close_Gate_Boss_1)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Close_Gate_Boss_1)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BattlenetBirth1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction
