    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Open_Boss_1_room, function Trig_Open_Boss_1_room_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Close Boss Room 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Close_Boss_Room_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3813, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3813), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3814, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3814), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3815, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3815), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3816, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3816), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3817, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3817), true)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("Birth", 'D01Q', gg_rct_Close_Gate_Boss_1)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Close_Gate_Boss_1)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BattlenetBirth1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Close_Boss_Room_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Close_Boss_Room_1, function Trig_Close_Boss_Room_1_Actions)
endfunction

    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3819, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3819), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3820, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3820), true)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("Birth", 'D01Q', gg_rct_Close_Gate_Boss_2)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Close_Gate_Boss_2)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BattlenetBirth1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Open Boss 3 room
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Open_Boss_3_room_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3821)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3822)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3823)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("Death Alternate", 'D01Q', gg_rct_Close_Gate_Boss_3)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Close_Gate_Boss_3)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BattlenetBirth1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Open_Boss_3_room takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Open_Boss_3_room=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Open_Boss_3_room, function Trig_Open_Boss_3_room_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Close Boss Room 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Close_Boss_Room_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3821, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3821), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3822, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3822), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3823, GetDestructableMaxLife(gg_dest_YTpc_3823), true)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("Birth", 'D01Q', gg_rct_Close_Gate_Boss_3)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Close_Gate_Boss_3)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BattlenetBirth1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Close_Boss_Room_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Close_Boss_Room_3=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Close_Boss_Room_3, function Trig_Close_Boss_Room_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Open Boss 3 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Open_Boss_3_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3826)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3825)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_3824)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_YTpc_4938)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("Death Alternate", 'D01Q', gg_rct_Open_Gate_Boss_3)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Open_Gate_Boss_3)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BattlenetBirth1, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Open_Boss_3_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Open_Boss_3_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Open_Boss_3_2, function Trig_Open_Boss_3_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stun Hero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stun_Hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[10]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00N', Player(10), udg_TempLocation[10], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A009', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", udg_Hero)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[10])
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(true, "gold", udg_Hero)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(false, "gold", udg_Hero)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stun_Hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stun_Hero=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stun_Hero, function Trig_Stun_Hero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mammon Cinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func023001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func025001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func027001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func029001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func031001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func033001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func035001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func038001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func040001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func042001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func044001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func046001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func048001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func050001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func052001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func055001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func066001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Func070001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CinematicON=true
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Close_Boss_Room_1)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Disable_Movement)
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D02G', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("hide", 'D018', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call CinematicModeBJ(true, GetPlayersAll())
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
    call SetUserControlForceOff(GetPlayersAll())
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call ShowUnitHide(udg_Bosses[2])
    call ShowUnitHide(udg_Bosses[3])
    call ShowUnitHide(udg_Bosses[4])
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Hero_Shadow_Warlock_Loc)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_041, Player(0), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_042, Player(0), 30.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    set udg_SkipCinematic[2]=true
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[1], "TRIGSTR_492", gg_snd_M1, "TRIGSTR_493", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.10, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[1], "TRIGSTR_496", gg_snd_M2, "TRIGSTR_497", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.07, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_498", gg_snd_SM1, "TRIGSTR_499", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.30, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[1], "TRIGSTR_494", gg_snd_M3, "TRIGSTR_495", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.40, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[1], "TRIGSTR_768", gg_snd_M4, "TRIGSTR_769", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.50, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[1], "TRIGSTR_770", gg_snd_M5, "TRIGSTR_771", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.30, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_077, Player(0), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_078, Player(0), 30.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[1], "TRIGSTR_782", gg_snd_M5, "TRIGSTR_783", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 1.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[1], "TRIGSTR_772", gg_snd_M6, "TRIGSTR_773", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.10, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_778", gg_snd_SM2, "TRIGSTR_779", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_780", null, "TRIGSTR_781", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[1], "TRIGSTR_774", gg_snd_M7, "TRIGSTR_775", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.61, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[1], "TRIGSTR_776", gg_snd_M8, "TRIGSTR_777", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.10, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[2])
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[3])
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[4])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Hero_Shadow_Warlock_Loc)
    call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(Player(0), 0.00)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_CinematicON=false
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[2] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_SkipCinematic[2]=false
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Enable_Movement)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Shade_Mammon)
    call SetUserControlForceOn(GetPlayersAll())
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
    set udg_BossfightON[1]=true
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D018', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D02G', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[1])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[1], "attack", udg_Hero)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[1])
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_MammonTimer, false, 1.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mammon_Cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mammon_Cinematic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Mammon_Cinematic, gg_rct_Enter_Boss_1_Area)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mammon_Cinematic, Condition(function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mammon_Cinematic, function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mammon Cinematic Skip
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Skip_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SkipCinematic[2] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Skip_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_SkipCinematic[2]=false
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[2])
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[3])
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[4])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Hero_Shadow_Warlock_Loc)
    call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(Player(0), 0.00)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Enable_Movement)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Shade_Mammon)
    call SetUserControlForceOn(GetPlayersAll())
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
    set udg_BossfightON[1]=true
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D018', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D02G', GetPlayableMapRect())
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[1])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[1], "attack", udg_Hero)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[1])
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_MammonTimer, false, 1.00)
    set udg_CinematicON=false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mammon_Cinematic_Skip takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mammon_Cinematic_Skip=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Mammon_Cinematic_Skip, Player(0))
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mammon_Cinematic_Skip, Condition(function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Skip_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mammon_Cinematic_Skip, function Trig_Mammon_Cinematic_Skip_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mammon Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mammon_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Bosses[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Dies_Func022A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BossfightON[1]=false
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_MammonDeath, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\BigBloodEX-NoSplat-NoGutz.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BigBloodEX-NoSplat-NoGutz.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_MammonVisibility=100.00
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Gem_Region_1)
    call CreateItemLoc('I002', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_Gem[1]=GetLastCreatedItem()
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_1_room)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mammon_autocast)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mammon_Melee_Attack)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Mammon)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Return_to_Mammon)
    call KillUnit(udg_MammonSkull)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ShadesGroup, function Trig_Mammon_Dies_Func022A)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Mammon)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_MammonEffect[1])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_MammonEffect[2])
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[1], 100.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Mammon_Spawn_Souls)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Mammon_Fade)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
    call CreateItemLoc('I003', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_GrandSoul[1]=GetLastCreatedItem()
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mammon_Spawn_Souls)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mammon_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mammon_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Mammon_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mammon_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Mammon_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mammon_Dies, function Trig_Mammon_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mammon Fade
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mammon_Fade_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MammonVisibility == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Fade_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MammonVisibility=( udg_MammonVisibility - 1 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_Bosses[1], 100, 100, 100, udg_MammonVisibility)
    if ( Trig_Mammon_Fade_Func003C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call RemoveUnit(udg_Bosses[1])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mammon_Fade takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mammon_Fade=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mammon_Fade)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Mammon_Fade, 0.05)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mammon_Fade, function Trig_Mammon_Fade_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mammon Spawn Souls
//
// Default melee game initialization for all players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mammon_Spawn_Souls_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], GetRandomReal(0, 75.00), GetRandomReal(0, 360.00))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\undeaddissipate2.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), GetRandomReal(500.00, 600.00))
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectOrientation(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00, 600.00, 0.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mammon_Spawn_Souls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mammon_Spawn_Souls=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mammon_Spawn_Souls)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Mammon_Spawn_Souls, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mammon_Spawn_Souls, function Trig_Mammon_Spawn_Souls_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mammon autocast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mammon_autocast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[1] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_autocast_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) >= 300.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_autocast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Mammon_autocast_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_MammonSpellsReal=1.00
        set udg_MammonSpellsReal=0.00
    else
        set udg_MammonSpellsReal=2.00
        set udg_MammonSpellsReal=0.00
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_MammonTimer, false, 5.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mammon_autocast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mammon_autocast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Mammon_autocast, udg_MammonTimer)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mammon_autocast, Condition(function Trig_Mammon_autocast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mammon_autocast, function Trig_Mammon_autocast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mammon Skull
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mammon_Skull_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_MammonTimer, false, 20.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_MammonSkull, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[1], "stop")
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[1])
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[1], "Spell Slam")
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed(udg_Bosses[1], udg_Hero, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.45)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[1])
    call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Bosses[1], "stand")
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 150.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[1]) - 20.00 ))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00M', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[1]), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[1]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    set udg_MammonSkull=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', udg_MammonSkull)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Mammon_Skull)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_MammonTimer, false, 2.50)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[1], "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mammon_Skull takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mammon_Skull=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Mammon_Skull, "udg_MammonSpellsReal", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mammon_Skull, function Trig_Mammon_Skull_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Mammon Skull
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Mammon_Skull_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_MammonSkull) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Mammon_Skull_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Mammon_Skull_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_MammonSkull)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 25.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_MammonSkull))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_MammonSkull, udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_MammonSkull))
    if ( Trig_Move_Mammon_Skull_Func006C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call KillUnit(udg_MammonSkull)
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[1], udg_Hero, 75.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[3], "war3mapImported\\Blink Red Caster.mdx")
        set udg_TempLocation[4]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
        set udg_TempLocation[5]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[4], 200.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[1]))
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[5], GetUnitFacing(udg_Hero))
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[5], "war3mapImported\\Blink Red Target.mdx")
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Stun_Hero)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
        set udg_MammonSpellsReal=2.00
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Mammon_Skull takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Mammon_Skull=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Mammon_Skull)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Move_Mammon_Skull, 0.02)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Move_Mammon_Skull, Condition(function Trig_Move_Mammon_Skull_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Mammon_Skull, function Trig_Move_Mammon_Skull_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mammon Skull Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mammon_Skull_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Skull_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mammon_Skull_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mammon_Skull_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Mammon_Skull_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mammon_Skull_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Mammon_Skull_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mammon_Skull_Dies, function Trig_Mammon_Skull_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mammon Melee Attack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[1] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func012Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 150.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func014Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 150.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func016Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 150.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func018Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 150.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_MammonTimer, false, 20.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_butcher_fullboar_chargeloop_vox02, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("left hand", udg_Bosses[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Bloodlust\\BloodlustTarget.mdl")
    set udg_MammonEffect[1]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("right hand", udg_Bosses[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Bloodlust\\BloodlustTarget.mdl")
    set udg_MammonEffect[2]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    if ( Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func010C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[1])
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[1], 70.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[1], "Spell Channel")
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.60)
    if ( Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func012C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Mammon)
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[1]))
        if ( Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func012Func005C() ) then
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Melee_Damage)
        else
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\FeralSpirit\\feralspirittarget.mdl")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.60)
    if ( Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func014C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[1]))
        if ( Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func014Func004C() ) then
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Melee_Damage)
        else
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\BattleRoar\\RoarCaster.mdl")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func016C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[1]))
        if ( Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func016Func004C() ) then
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\MirrorImage\\MirrorImageCaster.mdl")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[1], udg_Hero, 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        else
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Taunt\\TauntCaster.mdl")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.75)
    if ( Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func018C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[1]))
        if ( Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func018Func004C() ) then
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\MirrorImage\\MirrorImageCaster.mdl")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[1], udg_Hero, 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        else
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\FeralSpirit\\feralspirittarget.mdl")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.80)
    if ( Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Func020C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Mammon)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_MammonEffect[1])
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_MammonEffect[2])
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[1], 100.00)
        call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Bosses[1], "stand")
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[1])
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_MammonTimer, false, 7.00)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[1], "attack", udg_Hero)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mammon_Melee_Attack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mammon_Melee_Attack=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Mammon_Melee_Attack, "udg_MammonSpellsReal", EQUAL, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mammon_Melee_Attack, Condition(function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mammon_Melee_Attack, function Trig_Mammon_Melee_Attack_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Melee Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Melee_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[6]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, - 20.00)
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[1], udg_Hero, 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[6], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\MirrorImage\\MirrorImageCaster.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[6])
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[6]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, - 20.00)
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[1], udg_Hero, 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[6], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\MirrorImage\\MirrorImageCaster.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[6])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Melee_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Melee_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Melee_Damage, function Trig_Melee_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Mammon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Mammon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[4]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[5]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[4], 3.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[1]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[1], udg_TempLocation[5], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[1]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Mammon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Mammon=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Mammon)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Move_Mammon, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Mammon, function Trig_Move_Mammon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Shade Mammon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Shade_Mammon_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[1] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Shade_Mammon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Gem_Region_1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'uban', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_ShadesGroup)
    set udg_TempUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveGuardPosition(udg_TempUnit)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\SoulRitual.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_TempUnit, "attack", udg_Hero)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Shade_Mammon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Shade_Mammon=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Shade_Mammon)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spawn_Shade_Mammon, 10.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Shade_Mammon, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Shade_Mammon_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Shade_Mammon, function Trig_Spawn_Shade_Mammon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Dies Mammon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Dies_Mammon_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[1] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Mammon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BossfightON[1]=false
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_1_room)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[1])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[1])
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Bosses[1], 100)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_MammonTimer)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Shade_Mammon)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Return_to_Mammon)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Boss_1)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[1], udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Dies_Mammon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Mammon=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Mammon, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Mammon, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Dies_Mammon_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Mammon, function Trig_Hero_Dies_Mammon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Return to Mammon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Return_to_Mammon_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Return_to_Mammon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Close_Boss_Room_1)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Shade_Mammon)
    set udg_BossfightON[1]=true
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[1])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[1], "attack", udg_Hero)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[1])
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_MammonTimer, false, 1.00)
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Return_to_Mammon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Return_to_Mammon=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Return_to_Mammon)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Return_to_Mammon, gg_rct_Enter_Boss_1_Area)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Return_to_Mammon, Condition(function Trig_Return_to_Mammon_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Return_to_Mammon, function Trig_Return_to_Mammon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Engage Witch of Endor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor_Func027001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor_Func029001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor_Func031001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor_Func033001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor_Func138C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CinematicON=true
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[1])
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1])
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Remove_Shades)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Close_Boss_Room_2)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Hero)
    call CinematicModeBJ(true, GetPlayersAll())
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Bosses[2], 100)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Move_Necro_Witch)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_TempLocation[1], 257.33)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Witch_Move_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], 90.33)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_047, Player(0), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_048, Player(0), 30.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_SkipCinematic[3]=true
    set udg_WE_CS=1
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[2], "TRIGSTR_287", gg_snd_1, "TRIGSTR_288", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 9.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_297", gg_snd_SW1, "TRIGSTR_298", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.90, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[2], "TRIGSTR_299", gg_snd_2, "TRIGSTR_300", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[2], "TRIGSTR_529", null, "TRIGSTR_530", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.30, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[2], "TRIGSTR_531", gg_snd_3, "TRIGSTR_532", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_533", gg_snd_SW2, "TRIGSTR_534", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 6.20, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[2], "TRIGSTR_535", gg_snd_4, "TRIGSTR_536", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[2], "Spell Throw")
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[2], "TRIGSTR_543", null, "TRIGSTR_544", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 0.50, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_051, Player(0), 0)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[2], "TRIGSTR_537", null, "TRIGSTR_538", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 0.20, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Samuel)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\WarpDarkTarget.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[2], "TRIGSTR_539", null, "TRIGSTR_540", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 0.30, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Samuel)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Samuel_Teleport, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00I', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Birth")
    set udg_Samuel=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Samuel, "stand")
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[2], "TRIGSTR_541", null, "TRIGSTR_542", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Endor_Ward_Camera_2, Player(0), 0)
    set udg_WE_CS=2
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Amp_Region_1)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Ward_Place, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_yrel_r2_inside_loop_01, 50.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    set udg_WardLoopSound=GetLastPlayedSound()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_NW_Wards[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_NW_Wards[1], "Birth")
    set udg_WE_CS=3
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    // CREATE LIGHTNING HERE
    set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[1])
    set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    set udg_NW_WL[1]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
    set udg_NW_WL[3]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 200)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Bosses[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaShield\\ManaShieldCaster.mdl")
    set udg_NW_SE=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Samuel, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaShield\\ManaShieldCaster.mdl")
    set udg_SamuelShield=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    set udg_WE_CS=4
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Endor_Ward_Camera_1, Player(0), 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Amp_Region_2)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Ward_Place, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_NW_Wards[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_NW_Wards[2], "Birth")
    set udg_WE_CS=5
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    // CREATE LIGHTNING HERE
    set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[2])
    set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    set udg_NW_WL[2]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
    set udg_NW_WL[4]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 200)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning)
    set udg_WE_CS=6
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Necro_Witch_Camera, Player(0), 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[2], "TRIGSTR_511", gg_snd_5, "TRIGSTR_512", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(Player(0), 1.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 1.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    set udg_CinematicON=false
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[3] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_SkipCinematic[3]=false
    if ( Trig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor_Func138C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_520")
        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    else
    endif
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
    set udg_BossfightON[2]=true
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[2])
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Engage_Witch_of_Endor=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Engage_Witch_of_Endor, gg_rct_Enter_Boss_2_Area)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Engage_Witch_of_Endor, Condition(function Trig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Engage_Witch_of_Endor, function Trig_Engage_Witch_of_Endor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skip Witch of Endor Cinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SkipCinematic[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func041C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func034C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func045Func033Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func045Func033Func028Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_WE_CS == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif

endfunction
