    if ( not ( udg_WE_CS == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func047C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WE_CS == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_SkipCinematic[3]=false
    if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Samuel)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00I', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        set udg_Samuel=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Samuel, "stand")
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Amp_Region_1)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_yrel_r2_inside_loop_01, 50.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        set udg_WardLoopSound=GetLastPlayedSound()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        set udg_NW_Wards[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_NW_Wards[1], "Birth")
        set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[1])
        set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
        set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
        set udg_NW_WL[1]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
        set udg_NW_WL[3]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 200)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Bosses[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaShield\\ManaShieldCaster.mdl")
        set udg_NW_SE=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Samuel, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaShield\\ManaShieldCaster.mdl")
        set udg_SamuelShield=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Amp_Region_2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        set udg_NW_Wards[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_NW_Wards[2], "Birth")
        set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[2])
        set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
        set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
        set udg_NW_WL[2]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
        set udg_NW_WL[4]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 200)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning)
        call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(Player(0), 1.00)
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 1.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func047C() ) then
            call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
            call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_912")
            set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
        else
        endif
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
        set udg_BossfightON[2]=true
        call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[2])
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
    else
        if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001C() ) then
            set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Amp_Region_1)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_yrel_r2_inside_loop_01, 50.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
            set udg_WardLoopSound=GetLastPlayedSound()
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
            set udg_NW_Wards[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_NW_Wards[1], "Birth")
            set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[1])
            set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
            set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
            set udg_NW_WL[1]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
            set udg_NW_WL[3]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 200)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Bosses[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaShield\\ManaShieldCaster.mdl")
            set udg_NW_SE=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Samuel, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaShield\\ManaShieldCaster.mdl")
            set udg_SamuelShield=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
            set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Amp_Region_2)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
            set udg_NW_Wards[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_NW_Wards[2], "Birth")
            set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[2])
            set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
            set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
            set udg_NW_WL[2]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
            set udg_NW_WL[4]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 200)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning)
            call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(Player(0), 1.00)
            set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
            call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 1.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
            if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func041C() ) then
                call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
                call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_913")
                set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
            else
            endif
            call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
            set udg_BossfightON[2]=true
            call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[2])
            call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
            call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
            call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
        else
            if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052C() ) then
                set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[1])
                set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
                set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
                set udg_NW_WL[1]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
                set udg_NW_WL[3]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 200)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Bosses[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaShield\\ManaShieldCaster.mdl")
                set udg_NW_SE=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Samuel, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaShield\\ManaShieldCaster.mdl")
                set udg_SamuelShield=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
                set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Amp_Region_2)
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                set udg_NW_Wards[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                call SetUnitAnimation(udg_NW_Wards[2], "Birth")
                set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[2])
                set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
                set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
                set udg_NW_WL[2]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
                set udg_NW_WL[4]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 200)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning)
                call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(Player(0), 1.00)
                set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
                call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 1.00)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
                call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
                if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func034C() ) then
                    call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
                    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_914")
                    set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
                else
                endif
                call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
                set udg_BossfightON[2]=true
                call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[2])
                call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
                call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
                call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
            else
                if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func045C() ) then
                    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Amp_Region_2)
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                    set udg_NW_Wards[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
                    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_NW_Wards[2], "Birth")
                    set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[2])
                    set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
                    set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
                    set udg_NW_WL[2]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
                    set udg_NW_WL[4]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 200)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
                    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning)
                    call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(Player(0), 1.00)
                    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
                    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 1.00)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                    call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
                    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
                    if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func045Func022C() ) then
                        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
                        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_915")
                        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
                    else
                    endif
                    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
                    set udg_BossfightON[2]=true
                    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
                    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
                    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[2])
                    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
                    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
                    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
                    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
                    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
                else
                    if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func045Func033C() ) then
                        set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[2])
                        set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
                        set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
                        set udg_NW_WL[2]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
                        set udg_NW_WL[4]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 200)
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
                        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning)
                        call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(Player(0), 1.00)
                        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
                        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 1.00)
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                        call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
                        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
                        if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func045Func033Func017C() ) then
                            call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
                            call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_916")
                            set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
                        else
                        endif
                        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
                        set udg_BossfightON[2]=true
                        call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
                        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
                        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[2])
                        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
                        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
                        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
                        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
                        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func045Func033Func028C() ) then
                            call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(Player(0), 1.00)
                            set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
                            call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 1.00)
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                            call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
                            call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
                            if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func045Func033Func028Func008C() ) then
                                call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
                                call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_917")
                                set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
                            else
                            endif
                            call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
                            set udg_BossfightON[2]=true
                            call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
                            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
                            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[2])
                            call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
                            call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
                            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
                            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
                            call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Func005Func001Func052Func045Func033Func028Func019C() ) then
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    set udg_CinematicON=false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic, Player(0))
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic, Condition(function Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic, function Trig_Skip_Witch_of_Endor_Cinematic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Dies Witch of Endor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[2] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func025C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func027C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A012', udg_Hero) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BossfightON[2]=false
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Samuel)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Face_Hero)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge)
    call StopSoundBJ(udg_WardLoopSound, true)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_NW_SE)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SamuelShield)
    call RemoveItem(udg_GrandSoul[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_NW_Wards[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_NW_Wards[2])
    if ( Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func011C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning)
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[1])
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[2])
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[3])
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[4])
    else
    endif
    set udg_EndorBeam=false
    if ( Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func013C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func014C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func015C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[7])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[8])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaerUnitWE)
    if ( Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func025C() ) then
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[5])
    else
    endif
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning)
    if ( Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Func027C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A012', udg_Hero)
    else
    endif
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[2])
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport_location)
    set udg_WETeleport=false
    call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, udg_Bosses[2])
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[2])
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[2], 100.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[2])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_2_room)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Move_Necro_Witch)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor, function Trig_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Return to Witch of Endor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor_Func053C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Close_Boss_Room_2)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Samuel)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\WarpDarkTarget.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Samuel)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00I', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Birth")
    set udg_Samuel=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Samuel, "stand")
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Amp_Region_1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_yrel_r2_inside_loop_01, 50.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    set udg_WardLoopSound=GetLastPlayedSound()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_NW_Wards[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_NW_Wards[1], "Birth")
    set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[1])
    set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    set udg_NW_WL[1]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
    set udg_NW_WL[3]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 200)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Bosses[2], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaShield\\ManaShieldCaster.mdl")
    set udg_NW_SE=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Samuel, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ManaShield\\ManaShieldCaster.mdl")
    set udg_SamuelShield=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Necro_Amp_Region_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_NW_Wards[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_NW_Wards[2], "Birth")
    set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[2])
    set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    set udg_NW_WL[2]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
    set udg_NW_WL[4]=AddLightningEx("DRAM", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 200)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning)
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
    set udg_BossfightON[2]=true
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[2])
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
    if ( Trig_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor_Func053C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor, gg_rct_Enter_Boss_2_Area)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor, Condition(function Trig_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor, function Trig_Return_to_Witch_of_Endor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch of Endor Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Func025C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Witch_of_Endor)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Gem_Region_5)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_BansheeDeath, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call CreateItemLoc('I001', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_Gem[2]=GetLastCreatedItem()
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_2_room)
    set udg_BossfightON[2]=false
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Samuel)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Face_Hero)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge)
    set udg_EndorBeam=false
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Func013C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Func014C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Func015C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[7])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[8])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaerUnitWE)
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Func025C() ) then
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[5])
    else
    endif
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning)
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[2])
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport_location)
    set udg_WETeleport=false
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[2], 100.00)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_2_room)
    set udg_EV=100.00
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Dies)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_fade)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Spawn_Souls)
    call StopSoundBJ(udg_LaserLoopSound, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[2], "stand swim")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    call StopSoundBJ(udg_LaserLoopSound, true)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    call CreateItemLoc('I003', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_GrandSoul[3]=GetLastCreatedItem()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Dies, function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch of Endor fade
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_fade_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_EV == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_fade_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_EV=( udg_EV - 1 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_Bosses[2], 100, 100, 100, udg_EV)
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_fade_Func004C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Spawn_Souls)
        call RemoveUnit(udg_Bosses[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_of_Endor_fade takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_fade=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_fade)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_fade, 0.05)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_fade, function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_fade_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch of Endor Spawn Souls
//
// Default melee game initialization for all players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Spawn_Souls_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], GetRandomReal(0, 75.00), GetRandomReal(0, 360.00))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\undeaddissipate2.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), GetRandomReal(500.00, 600.00))
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectOrientation(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00, 600.00, 0.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_of_Endor_Spawn_Souls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Spawn_Souls=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Spawn_Souls)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Spawn_Souls, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Spawn_Souls, function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Spawn_Souls_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Samuel Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Samuel_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Samuel ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MammonVisibility=100.00
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Face_Hero)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Samuel, 100)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Fade)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Spawn_Souls)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Samuel_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Samuel_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Samuel_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Samuel_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Samuel_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Samuel_Dies, function Trig_Samuel_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch of Endor Move Lightning
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[1])
    set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_NW_LP[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[2])
    set udg_NW_LP[4]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    call MoveLightningEx(udg_NW_WL[1], true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
    call MoveLightningEx(udg_NW_WL[2], true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
    call MoveLightningEx(udg_NW_WL[3], true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[4]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[4]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[4]) + 100)
    call MoveLightningEx(udg_NW_WL[4], true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[3]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[3]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[4]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[4]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[4]) + 100)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[4])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning, function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Lightning_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch of Endor Wards Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_NW_Wards[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_NW_Wards[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_NW_Wards[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_NW_Wards[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Func001C() ) then
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[1])
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[3])
    else
        if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[2])
            call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[4])
        else
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Func002C() ) then
        call StopSoundBJ(udg_WardLoopSound, true)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_NW_SE)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SamuelShield)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies, function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Wards_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Samuel Charge Initiate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[2] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate_Func014Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SamuelHit == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    set udg_SamuelHit=false
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\VioletPulse.mdx")
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Charge_Hooves, 50.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_SamuelChargeEffect[2]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Samuel)
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Samuel, "spell throw")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate_Func010C() ) then
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Samuel, 0.00)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Face_Hero)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SamuelChargeEffect[2])
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate_Func014C() ) then
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Samuel, 100.00)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Face_Hero)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Samuel, "war3mapImported\\Valiant Charge Royal.mdx")
        set udg_SamuelChargeEffect[1]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge)
        if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate_Func014Func008C() ) then
        else
            call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Samuel)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Samuel, "attack", udg_Hero)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SamuelChargeEffect[1])
            call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Samuel)
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Samuel_Charge_Initiate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge_Initiate, 10.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge_Initiate, Condition(function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge_Initiate, function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Initiate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Samuel Face Hero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Samuel_Face_Hero_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Face_Hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Samuel, udg_TempLocation[1], AngleBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Samuel_Face_Hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Samuel_Face_Hero=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Face_Hero)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Samuel_Face_Hero, 0.05)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Samuel_Face_Hero, Condition(function Trig_Samuel_Face_Hero_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Samuel_Face_Hero, function Trig_Samuel_Face_Hero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Samuel Charge
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func001Func001Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_EndorBeam == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func001Func001Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[6], udg_TempLocation[7]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_NW_Wards[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_NW_Wards[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitHiddenBJ(udg_Bosses[2]) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func001Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[6], udg_TempLocation[5]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_NW_Wards[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[6], udg_TempLocation[4]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_NW_Wards[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[6], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Samuel))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[4]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[5]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[6]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 50.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Samuel))
    set udg_TempLocation[7]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Samuel, udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_Samuel))
    if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_SamuelHit=true
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Samuel, udg_Hero, 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SamuelChargeEffect[1])
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Stun_Hero)
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Samuel)
        if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func008C() ) then
            call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Samuel)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Samuel, "attack", udg_Hero)
        else
        endif
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Charge_Bam, 60.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    else
        if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_SamuelHit=true
            call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SamuelChargeEffect[1])
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, udg_NW_Wards[1], 500, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Stun_Samuel)
            if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func009C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Samuel, "attack", udg_Hero)
            else
            endif
            call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Charge_Bam, 60.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        else
            if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func001C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
                set udg_SamuelHit=true
                call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SamuelChargeEffect[1])
                call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, udg_NW_Wards[2], 500, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Stun_Samuel)
                if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func001Func009C() ) then
                    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Samuel, "attack", udg_Hero)
                else
                endif
                call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Charge_Bam, 60.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
                    set udg_SamuelHit=true
                    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SamuelChargeEffect[1])
                    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Hero, udg_Samuel, 200.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Stun_Samuel)
                    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Stun_Witch)
                    if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func001Func001Func011C() ) then
                        set udg_EndorBeam=false
                        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam)
                        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage)
                        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit)
                        call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[1])
                        call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[2])
                        call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[3])
                        call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[4])
                        call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[5])
                        call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[6])
                        call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[7])
                        call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[8])
                        call RemoveUnit(udg_LaerUnitWE)
                        call StopSoundBJ(udg_LaserLoopSound, true)
                        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
                        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_AstralimprisonEnd, 30.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
                        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[2], 100)
                    else
                    endif
                    if ( Trig_Samuel_Charge_Func009Func001Func001Func001Func012C() ) then
                        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Samuel, "attack", udg_Hero)
                    else
                    endif
                    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Charge_Bam, 60.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[6])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[7])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Samuel_Charge takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Samuel_Charge=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge, 0.02)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Samuel_Charge, function Trig_Samuel_Charge_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stun Samuel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stun_Samuel_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stun_Samuel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[8]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Samuel)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00N', Player(10), udg_TempLocation[8], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A009', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", udg_Samuel)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[8])
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(true, "gold", udg_Samuel)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('BPSE', udg_Samuel)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Samuel)
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(false, "gold", udg_Samuel)
    if ( Trig_Stun_Samuel_Func013C() ) then
        call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Samuel)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Samuel, "attack", udg_Hero)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stun_Samuel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stun_Samuel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stun_Samuel, function Trig_Stun_Samuel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stun Witch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stun_Witch_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stun_Witch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[8]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[2])
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00N', Player(10), udg_TempLocation[8], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A009', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", udg_Bosses[2])
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[8])
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(true, "gold", udg_Bosses[2])
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('BPSE', udg_Bosses[2])
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(false, "gold", udg_Bosses[2])
    if ( Trig_Stun_Witch_Func013C() ) then
        call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stun_Witch takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stun_Witch=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stun_Witch, function Trig_Stun_Witch_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch of Endor Laser
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[2] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Bosses[2], 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_WETeleport == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Func057C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_EndorBeam == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Func070C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[2] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Func071C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[2], "stop")
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[2])
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[2], "spell")
    set udg_EndorBeam=true
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.60)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[2], 0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[4]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[5]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[6]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[7]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[8]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[9]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[10]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_ShockWaveBirth1, 30.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Laser_Loop, 30.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    set udg_LaserLoopSound=GetLastPlayedSound()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00O', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[2], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]) - 90.00 ))
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[4], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[5], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[6], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[7], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[8], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[7]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[9], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaserBeamDummies[8]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[10], bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_LaerUnitWE=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[6])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[7])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[8])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[9])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[10])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Func057C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_AstralimprisonEnd, 30.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call StopSoundBJ(udg_LaserLoopSound, true)
    else
    endif
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[7])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaserBeamDummies[8])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LaerUnitWE)
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Func070C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Func071C() ) then
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[2], 100)
        call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Bosses[2], "stand")
    else
    endif
    set udg_EndorBeam=false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser, 20.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser, Condition(function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser, function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch of Endor Move Beam
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[4]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[5]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[6]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[7]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[8]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[9]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    set udg_TempLocation[10]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaerUnitWE)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_TempLocation[1], AngleBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[10]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[1], udg_TempLocation[2], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]) - 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[2], udg_TempLocation[3], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[3], udg_TempLocation[4], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[4], udg_TempLocation[5], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[5], udg_TempLocation[6], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[6], udg_TempLocation[7], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[7], udg_TempLocation[8], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LaserBeamDummies[8], udg_TempLocation[9], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[5])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[6])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[7])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[8])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[9])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[10])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam, function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Move_Beam_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch of Endor Laser Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[4]) <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func011Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[4]) <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction
