        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[4]=GetUnitLoc(udg_NW_Wards[2])
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func005C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Hero, 7.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func006C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[1], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[2], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[2])
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func010C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Hero, 7.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func011C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[1], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func011Func001C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[2], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[3])
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func015C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Hero, 7.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func016C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[1], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func016Func001C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[2], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[4])
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func020C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Hero, 7.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func021C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[1], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func021Func001C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[2], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[5])
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func025C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Hero, 7.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func026C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[1], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func026Func001C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[2], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[6])
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func030C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Hero, 7.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func031C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[1], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func031Func001C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[2], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[7])
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func035C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Hero, 7.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func036C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[1], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func036Func001C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[2], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LaserBeamDummies[8])
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func040C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Hero, 7.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func041C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[1], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        if ( Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Func041Func001C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_NW_Wards[2], 20.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\ArcaneTowerAttack.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        else
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[4])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage, 0.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage, function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_Laser_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Laser Unit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Laser_Unit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LaerUnitWE, udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Laser_Unit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit, 0.40)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Laser_Unit, function Trig_Move_Laser_Unit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch of Endor HP Steal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_HP_Steal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget == udg_Bosses[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[2]) < 2500.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_EndorBeam == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_HP_Steal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A00C', udg_Bosses[2])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[2], "healingwave", udg_Samuel)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A00C', udg_Bosses[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_of_Endor_HP_Steal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_HP_Steal=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_HP_Steal, "udg_DamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_HP_Steal, Condition(function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_HP_Steal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Witch_of_Endor_HP_Steal, function Trig_Witch_of_Endor_HP_Steal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HP Steal Start ability
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func019Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func021Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func023Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func025Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func025C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Samuel) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Bosses[2], ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[2]) + 100.00 ))
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Samuel, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[2], 20.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_arthas_deathcoil_missile10, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    set udg_NW_WL[5]=AddLightningEx("MBUR", true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 200)
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( "+100" ), udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, 15.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning)
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 250.00, 90.00)
    call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
    call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
    call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 0.50)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    if ( Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func019C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Bosses[2], ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[2]) + 100.00 ))
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Samuel, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( "+100" ), udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, 15.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 250.00, 90.00)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 0.50)
    else
        if ( Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func019Func001C() ) then
            call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[5])
        else
        endif
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning)
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    if ( Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func021C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Bosses[2], ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[2]) + 100.00 ))
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Samuel, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( "+100" ), udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, 15.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 250.00, 90.00)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 0.50)
    else
        if ( Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func021Func001C() ) then
            call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[5])
        else
        endif
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning)
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    if ( Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func023C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Bosses[2], ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[2]) + 100.00 ))
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Samuel, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( "+100" ), udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, 15.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 250.00, 90.00)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 0.50)
    else
        if ( Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func023Func001C() ) then
            call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[5])
        else
        endif
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning)
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    if ( Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func025C() ) then
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[2], 100.00)
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Samuel, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Bosses[2], ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[2]) + 100.00 ))
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
        call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( "+100" ), udg_TempLocation[1], 80.00, 15.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 250.00, 90.00)
        call SetTextTagPermanentBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), false)
        call SetTextTagLifespanBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 1.00)
        call SetTextTagFadepointBJ(GetLastCreatedTextTag(), 0.50)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning)
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[5])
    else
        if ( Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Func025Func001C() ) then
            call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_NW_WL[5])
        else
        endif
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HP_Steal_Start_ability takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HP_Steal_Start_ability=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Start_ability, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Start_ability, Condition(function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Start_ability, function Trig_HP_Steal_Start_ability_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: HP Steal Lightning
//===========================================================================
function Trig_HP_Steal_Lightning_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_NW_LP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    set udg_NW_LP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    call MoveLightningEx(udg_NW_WL[5], true, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[2]) + 150, GetLocationX(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_NW_LP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_NW_LP[1]) + 200)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_NW_LP[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HP_Steal_Lightning takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_HP_Steal_Lightning, function Trig_HP_Steal_Lightning_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Samuel Fade
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Samuel_Fade_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MammonVisibility == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Samuel_Fade_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MammonVisibility=( udg_MammonVisibility - 1 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_Samuel, 100, 100, 100, udg_MammonVisibility)
    if ( Trig_Samuel_Fade_Func003C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Spawn_Souls)
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
        call CreateItemLoc('I003', udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        set udg_GrandSoul[2]=GetLastCreatedItem()
        call RemoveUnit(udg_Samuel)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Samuel_Fade takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Samuel_Fade=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Fade)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Samuel_Fade, 0.05)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Samuel_Fade, function Trig_Samuel_Fade_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Samuel Spawn Souls
//
// Default melee game initialization for all players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Samuel_Spawn_Souls_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Samuel)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], GetRandomReal(0, 75.00), GetRandomReal(0, 360.00))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\undeaddissipate2.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), GetRandomReal(500.00, 600.00))
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectOrientation(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00, 600.00, 0.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Samuel_Spawn_Souls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Samuel_Spawn_Souls=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Samuel_Spawn_Souls)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Samuel_Spawn_Souls, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Samuel_Spawn_Souls, function Trig_Samuel_Spawn_Souls_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Boss 2 teleport
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_NW_Wards[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_NW_Wards[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_EndorBeam == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Bosses[2], 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_Func003Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[2] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_Func003Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[2] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 250.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Boss_2_teleport_Func003C() ) then
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[2])
        set udg_WETeleport=true
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[2], "spell throw")
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\WarpDarkCaster.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        if ( Trig_Boss_2_teleport_Func003Func012C() ) then
            call ShowUnitHide(udg_Bosses[2])
        else
        endif
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        if ( Trig_Boss_2_teleport_Func003Func014C() ) then
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport_location)
        else
        endif
    else
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Boss_2_teleport takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport, 7.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport, Condition(function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport, function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Boss 2 teleport location
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_location_Func003Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Bosses[2], 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_location_Func003Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Bosses[2], 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_location_Func003Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_location_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Region_126, udg_TempLocation[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_location_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], GetRandomReal(500.00, 700.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    if ( Trig_Boss_2_teleport_location_Func003C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_TempLocation[2], AngleBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[1]))
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\WarpDarkTarget.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[2], "birth")
        call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[2])
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.40)
        if ( Trig_Boss_2_teleport_location_Func003Func012C() ) then
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[2], "spell")
        else
        endif
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
        set udg_WETeleport=false
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[2])
        if ( Trig_Boss_2_teleport_location_Func003Func016C() ) then
            call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Bosses[2], "stand")
            set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[2])
            set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 130.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
            call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_WE_Projectile, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00P', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[2]), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[2]))
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_MissilesGroup)
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles)
        else
        endif
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        if ( Trig_Boss_2_teleport_location_Func003Func018C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles)
        else
        endif
    else
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Boss_2_teleport_location takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport_location=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport_location)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport_location, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Boss_2_teleport_location, function Trig_Boss_2_teleport_location_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Engage Demonic Centaur
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false )
endfunction

    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false )

endfunction

    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur_Func071C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CinematicON=true
    if ( Trig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur_Func002C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[1])
        call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur_Func003C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[2])
        call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[2])
    else
    endif
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Remove_Shades)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Close_Boss_Room_3)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Hero)
    call CinematicModeBJ(true, GetPlayersAll())
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetCameraBoundsToRectForPlayerBJ(Player(0), GetPlayableMapRect())
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_194)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_052, Player(0), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_053, Player(0), 70.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_SkipCinematic[4]=true
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[3], "TRIGSTR_545", gg_snd_B1, "TRIGSTR_546", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.40, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[3], "TRIGSTR_748", gg_snd_B2, "TRIGSTR_749", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 6.30, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_554", gg_snd_SB1, "TRIGSTR_555", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.50, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_750", gg_snd_SB2, "TRIGSTR_751", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 6.40, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[3], "TRIGSTR_552", gg_snd_B3, "TRIGSTR_553", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 8.10, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[3], "TRIGSTR_718", gg_snd_B4, "TRIGSTR_719", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 6.60, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[3], "TRIGSTR_720", gg_snd_B5, "TRIGSTR_721", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 8.90, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_752", gg_snd_SB3, "TRIGSTR_753", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.20, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_754", gg_snd_SB4, "TRIGSTR_755", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.50, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_075, Player(0), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_076, Player(0), 65.00)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_766", null, "TRIGSTR_767", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 0.50, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[3], "TRIGSTR_756", gg_snd_B6, "TRIGSTR_757", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 11.30, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[3], "TRIGSTR_758", gg_snd_B7, "TRIGSTR_759", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 8.70, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[3], "TRIGSTR_760", gg_snd_B8, "TRIGSTR_761", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.70, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_762", gg_snd_SB5, "TRIGSTR_763", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.00, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[3], "TRIGSTR_764", gg_snd_B9, "TRIGSTR_765", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 10.80, true)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_056, Player(0), 0)
    call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_CinematicON=false
    if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[4] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
        return
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    set udg_SkipCinematic[4]=false
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_DC_SpellTimer, false, 5.00)
    call SetCameraBoundsToRectForPlayerBJ(Player(0), gg_rct_Camera_Bounds)
    if ( Trig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur_Func070C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_547")
        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur_Func071C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], false, 120.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], "TRIGSTR_549")
        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[2]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    else
    endif
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
    set udg_BossfightON[3]=true
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[3])
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[3])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[3], "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Engage_Demonic_Centaur=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Engage_Demonic_Centaur, gg_rct_Enter_Boss_3_Area)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Engage_Demonic_Centaur, Condition(function Trig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Engage_Demonic_Centaur, function Trig_Engage_Demonic_Centaur_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skip Demonic Centaur
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skip_Demonic_Centaur_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SkipCinematic[4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Demonic_Centaur_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Demonic_Centaur_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Demonic_Centaur_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_SkipCinematic[4]=false
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_056, Player(0), 0)
    call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_SkipCinematic[4]=false
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_DC_SpellTimer, false, 5.00)
    call SetCameraBoundsToRectForPlayerBJ(Player(0), gg_rct_Camera_Bounds)
    if ( Trig_Skip_Demonic_Centaur_Func014C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_906")
        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Skip_Demonic_Centaur_Func015C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], false, 120.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], "TRIGSTR_907")
        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[2]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    else
    endif
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
    set udg_BossfightON[3]=true
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[3])
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[3])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[3], "attack", udg_Hero)
    set udg_CinematicON=false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Skip_Demonic_Centaur takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Skip_Demonic_Centaur=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Demonic_Centaur, Player(0))
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Skip_Demonic_Centaur, Condition(function Trig_Skip_Demonic_Centaur_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Skip_Demonic_Centaur, function Trig_Skip_Demonic_Centaur_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Hero Return
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Hero_Return_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hero_Return_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Close_Boss_Room_3)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_DC_SpellTimer, false, 5.00)
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
    set udg_BossfightON[3]=true
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[3])
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[3])
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[3], "attack", udg_Hero)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Hero_Return takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Hero_Return=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Hero_Return)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_DC_Hero_Return, gg_rct_Enter_Boss_3_Area)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Hero_Return, Condition(function Trig_DC_Hero_Return_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Hero_Return, function Trig_DC_Hero_Return_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Demonic Centaur Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Func026A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Func027A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Func028A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Func029Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Func029C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_DC_LightningOrb) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 50.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Beelzebub_Death_Sound, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\BigBloodEX-NoSplat-NoGutz.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_3_2)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_3_room)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
    call CreateItemLoc('I003', udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_GrandSoul[4]=GetLastCreatedItem()
    set udg_BossfightON[3]=false
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_DC_SpellTimer)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Hero_Dies)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Face_Hero)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Lightning)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Orb_Attack)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Boss_3_teleport_location)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Missiles)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_MissilesGroup, function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Func026A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_Missiles, function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Func027A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_HandsGroup, function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Func028A)
    if ( Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Func029C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(udg_DC_LightningOrb)
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_DCL)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_Clones, function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Func029Func003A)
    else
    endif
    set udg_DC_Split=false
    call StopSoundBJ(udg_DC_LightningLoop, true)
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[3])
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Bosses[3])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Demonic_Centaur_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Demonic_Centaur_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Demonic_Centaur_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Demonic_Centaur_Dies, function Trig_Demonic_Centaur_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Hero Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Func012A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Func015Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_DC_LightningOrb) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BossfightON[3]=false
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Bosses[3], 100)
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(udg_Bosses[3], 100)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_DC_SpellTimer)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Face_Hero)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Lightning)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Orb_Attack)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Boss_3_teleport_location)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Missiles)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_MissilesGroup, function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Func012A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_Missiles, function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Func013A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_HandsGroup, function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Func014A)
    if ( Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Func015C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(udg_DC_LightningOrb)
        call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_DCL)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_Clones, function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Func015Func003A)
    else
    endif
    set udg_DC_Split=false
    call StopSoundBJ(udg_DC_LightningLoop, true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[3])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[3])
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[3])
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Open_Boss_3_room)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Hero_Return)
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[3])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Spawn_Boss_3)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_DC_HP=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[3])
    set udg_DC_Mana=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Bosses[3])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Hero_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Hero_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DC_Hero_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Hero_Dies, Condition(function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Hero_Dies, function Trig_DC_Hero_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Cast Spells
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Bosses[3], 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Func003Func002Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber > 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Func003Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber > 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber > 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_RandomNumber <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DC_SpellsReal=0.00
    set udg_RandomNumber=GetRandomReal(0, 100.00)
    if ( Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_DC_SpellsReal=1.00
    else
        if ( Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Func003Func002C() ) then
            set udg_DC_SpellsReal=2.00
        else
            if ( Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Func003Func002Func002C() ) then
                set udg_DC_TeleportsLeft=7
                set udg_DC_SpellsReal=3.00
            else
                if ( Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Func003Func002Func002Func003C() ) then
                    set udg_DC_SpellsReal=1.00
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    set udg_DC_SpellsReal=0.00
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Cast_Spells takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Cast_Spells=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_DC_Cast_Spells, udg_DC_SpellTimer)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Cast_Spells, Condition(function Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Cast_Spells, function Trig_DC_Cast_Spells_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Wards
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Wards_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Face_Hero) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_3_Field)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00E', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[3]), udg_TempLocation[1], AngleBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]))
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HandsGroup)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "birth")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    if ( Trig_DC_Wards_Func010C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DC_Wards_Func011C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Face_Hero)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Wards takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Wards=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_DC_Wards, 20.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Wards, Condition(function Trig_DC_Wards_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Wards, function Trig_DC_Wards_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Wards Cast Spells
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "roar")
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_HandsGroup, function Trig_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells, function Trig_DC_Wards_Cast_Spells_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Wards Face Hero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Wards_Face_Hero_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Face_Hero_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DC_Wards_Face_Hero_Func003Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(GetEnumUnit(), udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Face_Hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_HandsGroup, function Trig_DC_Wards_Face_Hero_Func003A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Wards_Face_Hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Wards_Face_Hero=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Face_Hero)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Face_Hero, 0.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Face_Hero, function Trig_DC_Wards_Face_Hero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Wards Missiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Wards_Missiles_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_DC_HandsGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Missiles_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Missiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 150.00, GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00F', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[3]), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_MissilesGroup)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    if ( Trig_DC_Wards_Missiles_Func008C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Wards_Missiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Wards_Missiles=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Missiles, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Missiles, Condition(function Trig_DC_Wards_Missiles_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Missiles, function Trig_DC_Wards_Missiles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Wards Move Missiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_DC_MissilesGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'h00P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Func001Func005Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'h00P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Func001Func005Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_DC_MissilesGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    if ( Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Func001Func002C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 25.00, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    else
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 15.00, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    endif
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetEnumUnit(), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    if ( Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Func001Func005C() ) then
        call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_MissilesGroup)
        if ( Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Func001Func005Func003C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[2], udg_Hero, 400.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        else
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_Hero, 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        endif
        if ( Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Func001Func005Func004C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_MissilesGroup, function Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles, Condition(function Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles, function Trig_DC_Wards_Move_Missiles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Missiles Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Missiles_Dies_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00F' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00X' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Missiles_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_DC_Missiles_Dies_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Missiles_Dies_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Missiles_Dies_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_DC_Missiles) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Missiles_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DC_Missiles_Dies_Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_DC_MissilesGroup)
    else
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_DC_Missiles)
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_DC_Missiles_Dies_Func005C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Missiles)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Missiles_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Missiles_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DC_Missiles_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Missiles_Dies, Condition(function Trig_DC_Missiles_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Missiles_Dies, function Trig_DC_Missiles_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Wards Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Wards_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Wards_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Wards_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Wards_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Dies, Condition(function Trig_DC_Wards_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Wards_Dies, function Trig_DC_Wards_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Split Spell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006Func006Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006Func006Func006Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006Func006Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DC_RandomNumber > 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DC_RandomNumber > 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DC_RandomNumber <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DC_RandomNumber > 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DC_RandomNumber <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DC_RandomNumber <= 25.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[3])
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[3], "spell slam")
    call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Bosses[3], "stand")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_Teleport_FINAL, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func010C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call ShowUnitHide(udg_Bosses[3])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012C() ) then
        set udg_DC_RandomNumber=GetRandomReal(0, 100.00)
        if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002C() ) then
            set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
            call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
            call TriggerSleepAction(2.30)
            if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func005C() ) then
                set udg_DC_SplitReal=1.00
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006C() ) then
                set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
                call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                call TriggerSleepAction(2.30)
                if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006Func005C() ) then
                    set udg_DC_SplitReal=2.00
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006Func006C() ) then
                    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
                    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                    call TriggerSleepAction(2.30)
                    if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006Func006Func005C() ) then
                        set udg_DC_SplitReal=3.00
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006Func006Func006C() ) then
                        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
                        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                        call TriggerSleepAction(2.30)
                        if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func012Func002Func006Func006Func006Func005C() ) then
                            set udg_DC_SplitReal=4.00
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Func013C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_245)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00W', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "birth")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        set udg_DC_LightningOrb=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_DCLP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        set udg_DCLP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_DC_LightningOrb)
        set udg_DCL=AddLightningEx("CHIM", true, GetLocationX(udg_DCLP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_DCLP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_DCLP[1]) + 70, GetLocationX(udg_DCLP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_DCLP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_DCLP[2]) + 70)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_DCLP[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_DCLP[2])
        set udg_DC_OrbDamage=1.00
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Lightning)
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_DC_LightningOrb)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_DC_Loop, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        set udg_DC_LightningLoop=GetLastPlayedSound()
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Split_Spell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Split_Spell=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_DC_Split_Spell, "udg_DC_SpellsReal", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Split_Spell, Condition(function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Split_Spell, function Trig_DC_Split_Spell_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Move Lightning
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Move_Lightning_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DCLP[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_DCLP[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_DC_LightningOrb)
    call MoveLightningEx(udg_DCL, true, GetLocationX(udg_DCLP[1]), GetLocationY(udg_DCLP[1]), GetLocationZ(udg_DCLP[1]) + 70, GetLocationX(udg_DCLP[2]), GetLocationY(udg_DCLP[2]), GetLocationZ(udg_DCLP[2]) + 140)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_DCLP[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_DCLP[2])
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_Hero, udg_DC_OrbDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", udg_Hero, "war3mapImported\\ManaBreakTarget.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Move_Lightning takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Move_Lightning=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Lightning)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_DC_Move_Lightning, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Move_Lightning, function Trig_DC_Move_Lightning_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Split 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Split_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Split_1_Func047002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_1_Func047002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_1_Func047002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_1_Func047002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Split_1_Func047002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Split_1_Func054C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Split_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DC_Split=true
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
