    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[3])
    set udg_DC_HP=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[3])
    set udg_DC_Mana=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Bosses[3])
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy_3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Split_1_Func047002003))
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Hero, "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_TempGroup))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    // -----
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // -----
    if ( Trig_Split_1_Func054C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIre\\AIreTarget.mdl")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_DC_SplitReal=0.00
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Split_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Split_1=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Split_1, "udg_DC_SplitReal", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Split_1, Condition(function Trig_Split_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Split_1, function Trig_Split_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Split 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Split_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Split_2_Func047002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_2_Func047002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_2_Func047002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_2_Func047002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Split_2_Func047002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Split_2_Func054C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Split_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DC_Split=true
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy_3)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[3])
    set udg_DC_HP=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[3])
    set udg_DC_Mana=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Bosses[3])
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Split_2_Func047002003))
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Hero, "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_TempGroup))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    // -----
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // -----
    if ( Trig_Split_2_Func054C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIre\\AIreTarget.mdl")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_DC_SplitReal=0.00
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Split_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Split_2=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Split_2, "udg_DC_SplitReal", EQUAL, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Split_2, Condition(function Trig_Split_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Split_2, function Trig_Split_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Split 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Split_3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Split_3_Func047002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_3_Func047002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_3_Func047002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_3_Func047002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Split_3_Func047002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Split_3_Func054C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Split_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DC_Split=true
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[3])
    set udg_DC_HP=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[3])
    set udg_DC_Mana=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Bosses[3])
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy_3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy_2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Split_3_Func047002003))
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Hero, "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_TempGroup))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    // -----
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // -----
    if ( Trig_Split_3_Func054C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIre\\AIreTarget.mdl")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_DC_SplitReal=0.00
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Split_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Split_3=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Split_3, "udg_DC_SplitReal", EQUAL, 3.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Split_3, Condition(function Trig_Split_3_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Split_3, function Trig_Split_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Split 4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Split_4_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Split_4_Func047002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_4_Func047002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_4_Func047002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Split_4_Func047002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Split_4_Func047002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetFilterUnit() != udg_DC_LightningOrb), (IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Hero)) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Split_4_Func054C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Split_4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DC_Split=true
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy_2)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[3])
    set udg_DC_HP=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Bosses[3])
    set udg_DC_Mana=GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Bosses[3])
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy_3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195_Copy)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 180.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    // -----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o000', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 0.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_HP)
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Mana)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1000.00, udg_TempLocation[1], Condition(function Trig_Split_4_Func047002003))
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Hero, "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_TempGroup))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    // -----
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    // -----
    if ( Trig_Split_4_Func054C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIre\\AIreTarget.mdl")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_DC_SplitReal=0.00
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Split_4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Split_4=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Split_4, "udg_DC_SplitReal", EQUAL, 4.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Split_4, Condition(function Trig_Split_4_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Split_4, function Trig_Split_4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Hit Clone
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_IsDamageMelee == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Func002Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_Clones)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_DC_Clones) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget == udg_Bosses[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Func002Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_DC_Clones) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(udg_DamageEventTarget, udg_DC_Clones) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_DamageEventTarget)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_DC_Clone_dies, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_DamageEventTarget, udg_DC_Clones)
        call RemoveUnit(udg_DamageEventTarget)
        set udg_DC_OrbDamage=( udg_DC_OrbDamage + 1.00 )
        if ( Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Func002Func011C() ) then
            call StartTimerBJ(udg_DC_SpellTimer, false, 10.00)
            set udg_DC_Split=false
            call StopSoundBJ(udg_DC_LightningLoop, true)
            call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_DCL)
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Lightning)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Orb_Attack)
            call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[3])
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[3], "attack", udg_Hero)
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_Clones, function Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Func002Func001Func001A)
            set udg_DC_Split=false
            call StopSoundBJ(udg_DC_LightningLoop, true)
            call DestroyLightningBJ(udg_DCL)
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Lightning)
            call KillUnit(udg_DC_LightningOrb)
            call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_DC_Slam)
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Hit_Clone takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Hit_Clone=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_DC_Hit_Clone, "udg_DamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Hit_Clone, Condition(function Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Hit_Clone, function Trig_DC_Hit_Clone_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Orb Attack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Orb_Attack_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Orb_Attack_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Orb_Attack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_DC_LightningOrb)
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_DC_LightningOrb))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_DC_LightningOrb, udg_TempLocation[3], AngleBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[1]))
    if ( Trig_DC_Orb_Attack_Func005C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call KillUnit(udg_DC_LightningOrb)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_EclipseImpact, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[2], 0)
        call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 15.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\SanityEclipse.MDX")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 15.00)
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_Hero, 600.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Orb_Attack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Orb_Attack=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Orb_Attack)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_DC_Orb_Attack, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Orb_Attack, Condition(function Trig_DC_Orb_Attack_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Orb_Attack, function Trig_DC_Orb_Attack_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Slam
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Slam_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Slam_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Slam_Func014Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 400.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Slam_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Slam_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_DC_Slam_Initiate, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[3])
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[3], "Spell First")
    call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Bosses[3], "stand")
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[3], 50.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    if ( Trig_DC_Slam_Func012C() ) then
        call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[3], 100.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.15)
    if ( Trig_DC_Slam_Func014C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 120.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[3]))
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_EclipseImpact, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[2], 0)
        call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 15.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\SanityEclipse.MDX")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 15.00)
        if ( Trig_DC_Slam_Func014Func009C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_Hero, 600.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[3])
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[3], "attack", udg_Hero)
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_DC_SpellTimer, false, 10.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Slam takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Slam=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_DC_Slam, "udg_DC_SpellsReal", EQUAL, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Slam, Condition(function Trig_DC_Slam_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Slam, function Trig_DC_Slam_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Teleport Projectiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Teleport_Projectiles_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Bosses[3], 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Teleport_Projectiles_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Teleport_Projectiles_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Teleport_Projectiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[3])
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[3], "spell slam")
    call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Bosses[3], "stand")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    if ( Trig_DC_Teleport_Projectiles_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_OUT, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        call ShowUnitHide(udg_Bosses[3])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    if ( Trig_DC_Teleport_Projectiles_Func007C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Boss_3_teleport_location)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Teleport_Projectiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Teleport_Projectiles=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_DC_Teleport_Projectiles, "udg_DC_SpellsReal", EQUAL, 3.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DC_Teleport_Projectiles, Condition(function Trig_DC_Teleport_Projectiles_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Teleport_Projectiles, function Trig_DC_Teleport_Projectiles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Boss 3 teleport location
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Boss_3_teleport_location_Func003Func004Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_3_teleport_location_Func003Func004Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[3] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_3_teleport_location_Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DC_TeleportsLeft > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_3_teleport_location_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(gg_rct_Region_246, udg_TempLocation[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_3_teleport_location_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], GetRandomReal(500.00, 700.00), GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    if ( Trig_Boss_3_teleport_location_Func003C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        if ( Trig_Boss_3_teleport_location_Func003Func004C() ) then
            call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_IN, 100, udg_TempLocation[2], 0)
            set udg_DC_TeleportsLeft=( udg_DC_TeleportsLeft - 1 )
            call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_TempLocation[2], AngleBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[2], udg_TempLocation[1]))
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\BlinkBlue.mdx")
            call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
            if ( Trig_Boss_3_teleport_location_Func003Func004Func014C() ) then
                call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[3], "spell chain")
                call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Bosses[3], "stand")
                call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[3])
            else
            endif
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.80)
            if ( Trig_Boss_3_teleport_location_Func003Func004Func016C() ) then
                set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[3])
                set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 130.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[3]))
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00X', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[3]), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[3]))
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Missiles)
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00X', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[3]), udg_TempLocation[2], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[3]) + 20.00 ))
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Missiles)
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00X', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[3]), udg_TempLocation[2], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[3]) - 20.00 ))
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_DC_Missiles)
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
                call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Missiles)
                set udg_DC_SpellsReal=0.00
                set udg_DC_SpellsReal=3.00
            else
            endif
        else
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
            call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
            set udg_DC_SpellsReal=0.00
            set udg_DC_SpellsReal=1.00
        endif
    else
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Boss_3_teleport_location takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Boss_3_teleport_location=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Boss_3_teleport_location)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Boss_3_teleport_location, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Boss_3_teleport_location, function Trig_Boss_3_teleport_location_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DC Move Missiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DC_Move_Missiles_Func002Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Move_Missiles_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 25.00, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetEnumUnit(), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    if ( Trig_DC_Move_Missiles_Func002Func005C() ) then
        call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_DC_Missiles)
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_Hero, 250.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
endfunction

function Trig_DC_Move_Missiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_DC_Missiles, function Trig_DC_Move_Missiles_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DC_Move_Missiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DC_Move_Missiles=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_DC_Move_Missiles)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_DC_Move_Missiles, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DC_Move_Missiles, function Trig_DC_Move_Missiles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Boss Music Off
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Boss_Music_Off_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MusicReal1=0.00
    call ClearMapMusicBJ()
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_Playlist2="war3mapImported\\Boss1.mp3;war3mapImported\\Boss2.mp3;war3mapImported\\Boss3.mp3"
    call PlayMusic(udg_Playlist2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Boss_Music_Off takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Boss_Music_Off=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Boss_Music_Off, "udg_MusicReal1", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Boss_Music_Off, function Trig_Boss_Music_Off_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Boss Music On
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Boss_Music_On_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MusicReal2=0.00
    call ClearMapMusicBJ()
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_Playlist="war3mapImported\\Dante1.mp3;war3mapImported\\Dante2.mp3;war3mapImported\\Dante3.mp3;war3mapImported\\Dante4.mp3;war3mapImported\\Dante5.mp3;war3mapImported\\Dante6.mp3"
    call PlayMusic(udg_Playlist)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Boss_Music_On takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Boss_Music_On=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Boss_Music_On, "udg_MusicReal2", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Boss_Music_On, function Trig_Boss_Music_On_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

    return ( udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Teleport_to_Final_Boss_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teleport_to_Final_Boss_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Teleport_to_Final_Boss_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_CinematicON=true
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Remove_Shades)
        call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D010', gg_rct_Boss_Soul_Region_4)
        call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("show", 'D02G', gg_rct_Boss_Soul_Region_4)
        set udg_BossfightON[4]=true
        call CinematicModeBJ(true, GetPlayersAll())
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Soul_Well_Center)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 1.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call ShowUnitHide(udg_Hero)
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[1])
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[2])
        call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1])
        call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[2])
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Soul_Well_Center)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_AstralimprisonEnd, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\ManaVoidTarget.MDX")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Heal Blue.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 5.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Final_Boss_Cinematic_Camera_1, Player(0), 0)
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 5.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        set udg_SkipCinematic[5]=true
        call ShowUnitShow(udg_Hero)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero, "Birth")
        call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(udg_Hero, "stand")
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LucentBeam1, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\LucentBeamTarget.MDX")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Heal Blue.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Final_Boss_Cinematic_Camera_2, Player(0), 0)
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Final_Boss_Cinematic_Camera_3, Player(0), 20.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_564", gg_snd_Abaddon1, "TRIGSTR_565", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.20, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_568", gg_snd_Abaddon2, "TRIGSTR_569", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 7.90, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_566", gg_snd_SA1, "TRIGSTR_567", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 8.00, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_570", null, "TRIGSTR_571", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 1.00, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_572", null, "TRIGSTR_573", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 0.50, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Final_Boss_Cinematic_Camera_4, Player(0), 0)
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Final_Boss_Cinematic_Camera_5, Player(0), 35.00)
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_574", null, "TRIGSTR_575", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 1.50, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_576", gg_snd_Abaddon3, "TRIGSTR_577", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.30, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_578", gg_snd_Abaddon4, "TRIGSTR_579", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.80, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_580", null, "TRIGSTR_581", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.40, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_582", gg_snd_Abaddon5, "TRIGSTR_583", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 7.20, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_584", gg_snd_Abaddon6, "TRIGSTR_585", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.10, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_586", gg_snd_Abaddon7, "TRIGSTR_587", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.00, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Final_Boss_Cinematic_Camera_6, Player(0), 0)
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Final_Boss_Cinematic_Camera_7, Player(0), 45.00)
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_588", null, "TRIGSTR_589", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 7.40, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_590", gg_snd_Abaddon8, "TRIGSTR_591", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.30, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_592", gg_snd_SA2, "TRIGSTR_593", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.10, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_594", gg_snd_SA3, "TRIGSTR_595", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.20, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_596", gg_snd_Abaddon9, "TRIGSTR_597", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 12.70, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_598", gg_snd_Abaddon10, "TRIGSTR_599", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 11.45, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_600", gg_snd_SA4, "TRIGSTR_601", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.20, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_057, Player(0), 0)
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_058, Player(0), 65.00)
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_602", null, "TRIGSTR_603", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 3.00, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_604", gg_snd_Abaddon11, "TRIGSTR_605", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 16.60, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_606", gg_snd_Abaddon12, "TRIGSTR_607", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 13.40, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_608", gg_snd_Abaddon13, "TRIGSTR_609", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 8.70, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_610", gg_snd_Abaddon14, "TRIGSTR_611", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 6.00, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_612", gg_snd_Abaddon15, "TRIGSTR_613", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 18.90, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_614", gg_snd_SA5, "TRIGSTR_615", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.60, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_618", gg_snd_SA6, "TRIGSTR_619", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.00, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_059, Player(0), 0)
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_060, Player(0), 65.00)
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_616", null, "TRIGSTR_617", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.30, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_620", gg_snd_SA7, "TRIGSTR_621", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 7.90, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_622", gg_snd_Abaddon16, "TRIGSTR_623", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 10.40, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_624", gg_snd_Abaddon17, "TRIGSTR_625", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.00, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_626", gg_snd_Abaddon18, "TRIGSTR_627", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 14.50, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_716", gg_snd_Abaddon19, "TRIGSTR_717", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 9.10, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_628", gg_snd_Abaddon20, "TRIGSTR_629", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 6.55, true)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        set udg_MusicReal1=1.00
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Boss_fight_center_camera, Player(0), 0.00)
        call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        set udg_CinematicON=false
        if ( (udg_SkipCinematic[5] == false) ) then // INLINED!!
            return
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
        set udg_SkipCinematic[5]=false
        set udg_BossfightON[4]=true
        call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[4])
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[4])
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_LB_Cast_Spells)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[4], "attack", udg_Hero)
        set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_FB_Red
        set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_FB_Yellow
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_319")
        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], false, 120.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], "TRIGSTR_320")
        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[2]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    else
        if ( Trig_Teleport_to_Final_Boss_Func002Func009C() ) then
            call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_301")
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Teleport_to_Final_Boss takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Teleport_to_Final_Boss=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Teleport_to_Final_Boss, gg_rct_Soul_Well_Center)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Teleport_to_Final_Boss, Condition(function Trig_Teleport_to_Final_Boss_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Teleport_to_Final_Boss, function Trig_Teleport_to_Final_Boss_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skip Final Bossfight Cinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skip_Final_Bossfight_Cinematic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SkipCinematic[5] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skip_Final_Bossfight_Cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_SkipCinematic[5]=false
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    set udg_MusicReal1=1.00
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 0.50, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Boss_fight_center_camera, Player(0), 0.00)
    call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_BossfightON[4]=true
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[4])
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[4])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_LB_Cast_Spells)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[4], "attack", udg_Hero)
    set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_FB_Red
    set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_FB_Yellow
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_694")
    set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], false, 120.00)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], "TRIGSTR_695")
    set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[2]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    set udg_CinematicON=false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Skip_Final_Bossfight_Cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Skip_Final_Bossfight_Cinematic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventEndCinematic(gg_trg_Skip_Final_Bossfight_Cinematic, Player(0))
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Skip_Final_Bossfight_Cinematic, Condition(function Trig_Skip_Final_Bossfight_Cinematic_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Skip_Final_Bossfight_Cinematic, function Trig_Skip_Final_Bossfight_Cinematic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Return to Final Boss
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Return_to_Final_Boss_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Return_to_Final_Boss_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerExecCount(GetTriggeringTrigger()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Return_to_Final_Boss_Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Return_to_Final_Boss_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItem(udg_Hero, udg_Gem[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Return_to_Final_Boss_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Return_to_Final_Boss_Func001C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ShadesGroup, function Trig_Return_to_Final_Boss_Func001Func002A)
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Remove_Shades)
        set udg_BossfightON[4]=true
        call CinematicModeBJ(true, GetPlayersAll())
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Soul_Well_Center)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), udg_TempLocation[1], 1.00)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call ShowUnitHide(udg_Hero)
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[1])
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GemsFadeTimer[2])
        call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1])
        call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[2])
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Soul_Well_Center)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_AstralimprisonEnd, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\ManaVoidTarget.MDX")
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Heal Blue.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 5.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Boss_fight_center_camera, Player(0), 0)
        call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\White_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        call ShowUnitShow(udg_Hero)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero, "Birth")
        call SetCameraTargetControllerNoZForPlayer(Player(0), udg_Hero, 0, 0, false)
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LucentBeam1, 70.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\LucentBeamTarget.MDX")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Heal Blue.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        set udg_MusicReal1=1.00
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Hero)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Death_Shades)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Life_Shades)
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_Hero, Player(0))
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[4])
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[4])
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_LB_Cast_Spells)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[4], "attack", udg_Hero)
        set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_FB_Red
        set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_FB_Yellow
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Hero, 100)
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], false, 120.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[1], "TRIGSTR_324")
        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[1]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], false, 120.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GemsFadeTimer[2], "TRIGSTR_325")
        set udg_GemFadeTimerWindow[2]=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    else
        if ( Trig_Return_to_Final_Boss_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_307")
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Return_to_Final_Boss takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Return_to_Final_Boss=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Return_to_Final_Boss)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Return_to_Final_Boss, gg_rct_Soul_Well_Center)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Return_to_Final_Boss, Condition(function Trig_Return_to_Final_Boss_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Return_to_Final_Boss, function Trig_Return_to_Final_Boss_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LB Attack Sounds
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LB_Attack_Sounds_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventSource == udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_IsDamageMelee == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Attack_Sounds_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Attack_Sounds, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LB_Attack_Sounds takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LB_Attack_Sounds=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_LB_Attack_Sounds, "udg_DamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_LB_Attack_Sounds, Condition(function Trig_LB_Attack_Sounds_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LB_Attack_Sounds, function Trig_LB_Attack_Sounds_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Dies Reset Bossfight 4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4_Func064A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MusicReal2=1.00
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[4])
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4])
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(udg_Bosses[4], GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(udg_Bosses[4]))
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(false, "fast", udg_Bosses[4])
    call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, udg_Bosses[4])
    set udg_BossfightON[4]=false
    set udg_WardsBoolean=false
    set udg_FireCircleON=false
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Bosses[4], 100)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[4])
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Circle)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Close_to_Hero)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Wards)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ward_Damage)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Missiles)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_LB_Cast_Spells)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Return_to_Final_Boss)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[0])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[0])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[0])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[0])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[6])
    call KillSoundWhenDoneBJ(udg_LB_FireLoop)
    set udg_ArmageddonBoolean=false
    set udg_ChargeHitBoss=false
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Meteors)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_LB_ArmageddonTimer)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_LB_FW_FireMissileTimer)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_LB_FW_RotateTimer)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_LB_MissilesGroup, function Trig_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4_Func064A)
    set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_10
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
    call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_11
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
    call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_LB_CenterFlame)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_LB_ArmageddonEffect)
    set udg_WardsBoolean2=false
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ward_Stand_in_middle)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Final_Boss_Spawn)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[4])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4, function Trig_Hero_Dies_Reset_Bossfight_4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LB Cast Spells
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WardsBoolean == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_ArmageddonBoolean == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_Bosses[4], 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_Bosses[4]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_FireCircleON == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001Func002Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_LB_RandomNumber > 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_LB_RandomNumber > 80.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_LB_RandomNumber < 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_LB_RandomNumber > 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_LB_RandomNumber < 80.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_LB_RandomNumber > 40.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_LB_RandomNumber < 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_LB_RandomNumber > 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_LB_RandomNumber < 40.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_LB_RandomNumber < 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_LB_RandomNumber=GetRandomReal(0, 120.00)
    set udg_LB_CastSpells=0.00
    if ( Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_LB_CastSpells=1.00
    else
        if ( Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_LB_CastSpells=2.00
            else
                set udg_LB_CastSpells=1.00
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001Func002C() ) then
                set udg_LB_CastSpells=3.00
            else
                if ( Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_LB_CastSpells=5.00
                else
                    if ( Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_LB_CastSpells=6.00
                    else
                        if ( Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Func007Func001Func002Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                            set udg_LB_CastSpells=7.00
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LB_Cast_Spells takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LB_Cast_Spells=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_LB_Cast_Spells)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_LB_Cast_Spells, 8.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_LB_Cast_Spells, Condition(function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LB_Cast_Spells, function Trig_LB_Cast_Spells_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Souls Last Boss
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Souls_Last_Boss_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Souls_Last_Boss_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Boss_Soul_Region_1)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\undeaddissipate2.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), GetRandomReal(800.00, 900.00))
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectOrientation(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), Deg2Rad(udg_SoulAngle), 600.00, 0.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Boss_Soul_Region_2)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\undeaddissipate2.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), GetRandomReal(800.00, 900.00))
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectOrientation(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), Deg2Rad(udg_SoulAngle), 600.00, 0.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Boss_Soul_Region_3)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\undeaddissipate2.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), GetRandomReal(800.00, 900.00))
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectOrientation(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), Deg2Rad(udg_SoulAngle), 600.00, 0.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Boss_Soul_Region_4)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\undeaddissipate2.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), GetRandomReal(800.00, 900.00))
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectOrientation(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), Deg2Rad(udg_SoulAngle), 600.00, 0.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Souls_Last_Boss takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Souls_Last_Boss=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spawn_Souls_Last_Boss, 0.30)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Souls_Last_Boss, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Souls_Last_Boss_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Souls_Last_Boss, function Trig_Spawn_Souls_Last_Boss_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Final Boss Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_DamageEventTarget == udg_Bosses[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Func003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'uban' )
endfunction

function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Func003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u001' )
endfunction

function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Func003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'uban'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u001')) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction
