function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Func069A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_MusicReal2=1.00
    set udg_TempGroup=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Func003002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(udg_TempRegion), function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Func004A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_TempGroup)
    set udg_LethalDamageHP=1.00
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[4])
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Hero)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[4])
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4])
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(udg_Bosses[4], GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(udg_Bosses[4]))
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(false, "fast", udg_Bosses[4])
    call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, udg_Bosses[4])
    set udg_BossfightON[4]=false
    set udg_WardsBoolean=false
    set udg_FireCircleON=false
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[4])
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Bosses[4], 100)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Avul', udg_Bosses[4])
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Circle)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Close_to_Hero)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Wards)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ward_Damage)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Missiles)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_LB_Cast_Spells)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Return_to_Final_Boss)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Ward[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[0])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[0])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[0])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[0])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[1])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[2])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[6])
    call KillSoundWhenDoneBJ(udg_LB_FireLoop)
    set udg_ArmageddonBoolean=false
    set udg_ChargeHitBoss=false
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Meteors)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_LB_ArmageddonTimer)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_LB_FW_FireMissileTimer)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_LB_FW_RotateTimer)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_LB_MissilesGroup, function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Func069A)
    set udg_GemRegion[1]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_10
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[1])
    call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    set udg_GemRegion[2]=gg_rct_Gem_Region_11
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetRectCenter(udg_GemRegion[2])
    call SetItemPositionLoc(udg_Gem[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_LB_CenterFlame)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_LB_ArmageddonEffect)
    set udg_WardsBoolean2=false
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ward_Stand_in_middle)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Final_Boss_Dies_Cinematic)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Final_Boss_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Final_Boss_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Final_Boss_Dies, "udg_LethalDamageEvent", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Final_Boss_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Final_Boss_Dies, function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Final Boss Dies Cinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CinematicModeBJ(true, GetPlayersAll())
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 3.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call StopSoundBJ(udg_LB_FC_Sound, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Hero)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 3.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 2.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_199)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_065, Player(0), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_066, Player(0), 25.00)
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(true, "alternate", udg_Bosses[4])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Boss_Dies, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_Bosses[4], "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Red NO SOUND SLOWED.mdx")
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_630", gg_snd_Abaddon21, "TRIGSTR_631", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 1.00, true)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Special_Effects_Boss_Dies)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_710", null, "TRIGSTR_711", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 1.00, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_634", gg_snd_Abaddon22, "TRIGSTR_635", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.20, true)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[4], 5.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "birth")
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_708", null, "TRIGSTR_709", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 0.30, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_698", null, "TRIGSTR_699", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 1.00, true)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Special_Effects_Boss_Dies)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Bosses[4], "TRIGSTR_712", null, "TRIGSTR_713", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 1.50, true)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[4], 0.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB_Explode, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.40)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_Bosses[4], 100.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\NewAirEX.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 50.00)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\NewMassiveEX.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 50.00)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetUnitExplodedBJ(udg_Bosses[4], true)
    call ExplodeUnitBJ(udg_Bosses[4])
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 10.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_632", gg_snd_SS21, "TRIGSTR_633", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 7.30, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_200)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00L', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\LevelupCaster.MDX")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Heal.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 1.50)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Birth")
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Wings (6) SMALLER.mdx")
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "war3mapImported\\OmniLightOrangeSmall.mdx")
    call QueueUnitAnimationBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "stand")
    set udg_Seraphiel=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 5.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_638", gg_snd_SO1, "TRIGSTR_639", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.00, true)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_063, Player(0), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_064, Player(0), 60.00)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_640", null, "TRIGSTR_641", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.30, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_642", gg_snd_SO2, "TRIGSTR_643", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.70, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_644", gg_snd_SS22, "TRIGSTR_645", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 1.50, true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_200)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(udg_Hero, udg_TempLocation[1], 0.10)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_646", null, "TRIGSTR_647", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.00, true)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_073, Player(0), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_074, Player(0), 120.00)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_650", gg_snd_SS23, "TRIGSTR_651", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.70, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_648", gg_snd_SO3, "TRIGSTR_649", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.10, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_652", gg_snd_SO4, "TRIGSTR_653", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.90, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_654", gg_snd_SO5, "TRIGSTR_655", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 4.80, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_656", gg_snd_SO6, "TRIGSTR_657", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 7.20, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_658", gg_snd_SO7, "TRIGSTR_659", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 7.40, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_662", gg_snd_SS24, "TRIGSTR_663", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 8.10, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_664", gg_snd_SO8, "TRIGSTR_665", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 6.30, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_660", gg_snd_SO9, "TRIGSTR_661", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 5.80, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_666", gg_snd_SO10, "TRIGSTR_667", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.00, true)
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Seraphiel, "spell")
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_200)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\WarpHolyCaster.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Holy Light.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Seraphiel, "TRIGSTR_672", null, "TRIGSTR_673", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 0.50, true)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_200)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Hero, "move", udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call ShowUnitHide(udg_Seraphiel)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_706", gg_snd_SS25, "TRIGSTR_707", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 0.50, true)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Seraphiel)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_069, Player(0), 0)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_070, Player(0), 45.00)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_678", null, "TRIGSTR_679", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 2.70, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_686", gg_snd_SS26, "TRIGSTR_687", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 9.10, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_688", gg_snd_SS27, "TRIGSTR_689", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 6.90, true)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Hero, "TRIGSTR_690", gg_snd_SS28, "TRIGSTR_691", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 6.00, true)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_070, Player(0), 5.00)
    call CinematicFadeBJ(bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 5.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_715")
    call CustomVictoryBJ(Player(0), true, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Final_Boss_Dies_Cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Final_Boss_Dies_Cinematic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Final_Boss_Dies_Cinematic, function Trig_Final_Boss_Dies_Cinematic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Special Effects Boss Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Special_Effects_Boss_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Nether Blast IV EDITED FINAL.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectHeight(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 100.00)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectOrientation(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), GetRandomReal(0, 1000000000.00), GetRandomReal(0, 1000000000.00), GetRandomReal(0, 1000000000.00))
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Special_Effects_Boss_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Special_Effects_Boss_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Special_Effects_Boss_Dies)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Special_Effects_Boss_Dies, 0.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Special_Effects_Boss_Dies, function Trig_Special_Effects_Boss_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fire Path
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fire_Path_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[4])
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Spell Slam")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.70)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[4])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 150.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[4]))
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 5.00)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Fire_Path, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[4]))
    set udg_LB_FireBall[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent(udg_LB_FireBall[1], 50.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Fire_Path)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[4], "attack", udg_Hero)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_FireBall[1])
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Fire_Path)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fire_Path takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fire_Path=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Fire_Path, "udg_LB_CastSpells", EQUAL, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fire_Path, function Trig_Fire_Path_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Fire Path
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Fire_Path_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Fire_Path_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_FireBall[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[1]))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LB_FireBall[1], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[1]))
    if ( Trig_Move_Fire_Path_Func005C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 25.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Fire_Path takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Fire_Path=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Fire_Path)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Move_Fire_Path, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Fire_Path, function Trig_Move_Fire_Path_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fire Circle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fire_Circle_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Circle_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Circle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[4])
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Birth")
    set udg_FireCircleON=true
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Fire_Circle, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_LB_FC_Sound=GetLastPlayedSound()
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.60)
    if ( Trig_Fire_Circle_Func009C() ) then
        call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4])
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[4])
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[1], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
        set udg_LB_FireBall[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Circle)
        call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 2.00)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(13.00)
    if ( Trig_Fire_Circle_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_FireCircleON=false
        call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Circle)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fire_Circle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fire_Circle=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Fire_Circle, "udg_LB_CastSpells", EQUAL, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fire_Circle, function Trig_Fire_Circle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Circle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Circle_Func009Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Circle_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    if ( Trig_Move_Circle_Func009Func003C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 7.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Circle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[2]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LB_FireBall[2], udg_TempLocation[1], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[2]) + 6.00 ))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[2], GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_LB_FireBallGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_LB_FireBallGroup, function Trig_Move_Circle_Func009A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Circle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Circle=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Circle)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Move_Circle, 0.06)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Circle, function Trig_Move_Circle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fireball unit dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fireball_unit_dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'hrif' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fireball_unit_dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fireball_unit_dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fireball_unit_dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Fireball_unit_dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Fireball_unit_dies, Condition(function Trig_Fireball_unit_dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fireball_unit_dies, function Trig_Fireball_unit_dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FB Charge
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FB_Charge_Func003Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FB_Charge_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) >= 300.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FB_Charge_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    if ( Trig_FB_Charge_Func003C() ) then
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(true, "fast", udg_Bosses[4])
        call SetUnitMoveSpeed(udg_Bosses[4], 400.00)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Close_to_Hero)
        call TriggerSleepAction(6.00)
        if ( Trig_FB_Charge_Func003Func011C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Close_to_Hero)
            call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(false, "fast", udg_Bosses[4])
            call SetUnitMoveSpeed(udg_Bosses[4], GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(udg_Bosses[4]))
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[4], "attack", udg_Hero)
        else
        endif
    else
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        set udg_LB_CastSpells=1.00
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FB_Charge takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FB_Charge=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_FB_Charge, "udg_LB_CastSpells", EQUAL, 3.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_FB_Charge, function Trig_FB_Charge_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Close to Hero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Close_to_Hero_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[2]) <= 250.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Close_to_Hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    if ( Trig_Close_to_Hero_Func003C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ(false, "fast", udg_Bosses[4])
        call SetUnitMoveSpeed(udg_Bosses[4], GetUnitDefaultMoveSpeed(udg_Bosses[4]))
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[4])
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Spell Slam")
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.40)
        set udg_LB_CastSpells=1.00
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Close_to_Hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Close_to_Hero=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Close_to_Hero)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Close_to_Hero, 0.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Close_to_Hero, function Trig_Close_to_Hero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Explosion
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Explosion_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Stomp, 60.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    set udg_TempLocation[0]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Bosses[4]))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[0], 0.00)
    set udg_LB_FireBall[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[0], 45.00)
    set udg_LB_FireBall[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[0], 90.00)
    set udg_LB_FireBall[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[0], 135.00)
    set udg_LB_FireBall[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[0], 180.00)
    set udg_LB_FireBall[7]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[0], 245.00)
    set udg_LB_FireBall[8]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[0], 270.00)
    set udg_LB_FireBall[9]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[0], 315.00)
    set udg_LB_FireBall[10]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[0])
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Fires)
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 10.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 8.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 6.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 4.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 2.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_Bosses[4])
    call ResetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4])
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_Bosses[4], "attack", udg_Hero)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_WardsBoolean=false
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Fires)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_FireBall[3])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_FireBall[4])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_FireBall[5])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_FireBall[6])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_FireBall[7])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_FireBall[8])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_FireBall[9])
    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_FireBall[10])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Explosion takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Explosion=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Explosion, function Trig_Explosion_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Fires
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Fires_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Fires_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Fires_Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Fires_Func032C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Fires_Func041C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Fires_Func050C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Fires_Func059C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Fires_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_FireBall[3])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[3]))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LB_FireBall[3], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[3]))
    if ( Trig_Move_Fires_Func005C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 10.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_FireBall[4])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[4]))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LB_FireBall[4], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[4]))
    if ( Trig_Move_Fires_Func014C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 10.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_FireBall[5])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[5]))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LB_FireBall[5], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[5]))
    if ( Trig_Move_Fires_Func023C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 10.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_FireBall[6])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[6]))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LB_FireBall[6], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[6]))
    if ( Trig_Move_Fires_Func032C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 10.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_FireBall[7])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[7]))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LB_FireBall[7], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[7]))
    if ( Trig_Move_Fires_Func041C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 10.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_FireBall[8])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[8]))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LB_FireBall[8], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[8]))
    if ( Trig_Move_Fires_Func050C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 10.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_FireBall[9])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 20.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[9]))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_LB_FireBall[9], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_LB_FireBall[9]))
    if ( Trig_Move_Fires_Func059C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 10.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Fires takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Fires=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Fires)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Move_Fires, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Fires, function Trig_Move_Fires_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wards
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wards_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wards_Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wards_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_WardsBoolean=true
    set udg_WardsBoolean2=true
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Laugh_2, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[4])
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Morph")
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkCaster_Portrait.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 3.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.70)
    if ( Trig_Wards_Func014C() ) then
        call ShowUnitHide(udg_Bosses[4])
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.70)
    if ( Trig_Wards_Func016C() ) then
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "Doodads\\Cinematic\\TownBurningFireEmitter\\TownBurningFireEmitter.mdl")
        set udg_LB_CenterFlame=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(udg_LB_FireLoop, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        set udg_LB_FireLoop=GetLastPlayedSound()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
        set udg_Ward[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, 0.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00A', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[2], 0.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\BlinkCaster_Portrait.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_Ward[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00A', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[2], 90.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\BlinkCaster_Portrait.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_Ward[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, 180.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00A', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[2], 180.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\BlinkCaster_Portrait.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_Ward[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, 270.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00A', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[2], 270.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[2], "war3mapImported\\BlinkCaster_Portrait.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_Ward[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        // Create Beam 1
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, 0.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[0]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, 0.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, 0.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, 0.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, 0.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, 0.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, 0.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        // Create Beam 2
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[0]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, 90.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        // Create Beam 3
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, 180.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[0]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, 180.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, 180.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, 180.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, 180.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, 180.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, 180.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        // Create Beam 4
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, 270.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[0]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, 270.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, 270.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, 270.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, 270.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, 270.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, 270.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[3], bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
        // End/Clear Leaks
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        set udg_WardRotateSpeed=1.00
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Wards)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Ward_Damage)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Ward_Stand_in_middle)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wards takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wards=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Wards, "udg_LB_CastSpells", EQUAL, 5.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wards, function Trig_Wards_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Wards
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Wards_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Ward[1], udg_TempLocation[1], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + udg_WardRotateSpeed ))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ----
    // Start Beam 1
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Ward[2], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[2]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    // ----
    // Start Move Beam
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[0], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[3], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[4], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[5], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[6], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    // End Move Beam 1
    // ----
    // Start Beam 2
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Ward[3], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[3]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    // ----
    // Start Move Beam
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[0], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[3], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[4], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[5], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 90.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[6], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    // End Move Beam 2
    // ----
    // Start Beam 3
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 180.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Ward[4], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[4]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    // ----
    // Start Move Beam
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 180.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[0], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 180.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 180.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 180.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[3], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 180.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[4], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 180.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[5], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 180.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[6], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    // End Move Beam 3
    // ----
    // Start Beam 4
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 270.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Ward[5], udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[5]))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    // ----
    // Start Move Beam
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 200.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 270.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[0], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 300.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 270.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[1], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 400.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 270.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[2], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 500.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 270.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[3], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 600.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 270.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[4], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 700.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 270.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[5], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 800.00, ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[1]) + 270.00 ))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[6], udg_TempLocation[3])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
    // ----
    // End Move Beam 4
    // ----
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Wards takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Wards=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Wards)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Move_Wards, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Wards, function Trig_Move_Wards_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ward Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ward_Damage_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[0], udg_TempLocation[1]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ward_Damage_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[0], udg_TempLocation[1]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction
