    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[0], udg_TempLocation[1]) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ward_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_WardDamage=25.00
    set udg_TempLocation[0]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    // ---------------------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[0])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func005C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[1])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func008C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[2])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func011C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[3])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func014C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[4])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func017C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[5])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func020C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[6])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func023C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---------------------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[0])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func027C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[1])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func030C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[2])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func033C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[3])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func036C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[4])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func039C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[5])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func042C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[6])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func045C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---------------------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[0])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func049C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[1])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func052C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[2])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func055C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[3])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func058C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[4])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func061C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[5])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func064C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[6])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func067C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---------------------
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[0])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func071C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[1])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func074C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[2])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func077C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[3])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func080C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[4])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func083C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[5])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func086C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[6])
    if ( Trig_Ward_Damage_Func089C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, udg_WardDamage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    // ---------------------
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[0])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ward_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ward_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ward_Damage)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Ward_Damage, 0.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ward_Damage, function Trig_Ward_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove Wards
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_Wards_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Wards_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Remove_Wards_Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Wards_Func006Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Ward[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Wards_Func006Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Ward[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Wards_Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Ward[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Wards_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Ward[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Wards_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_Ward[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_Ward[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_Ward[4]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(udg_Ward[5]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Wards_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_WardRotateSpeed=( udg_WardRotateSpeed + 0.75 )
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkCaster.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    if ( Trig_Remove_Wards_Func006C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[0])
        call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[1])
        call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[2])
        call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[3])
        call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[4])
        call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[5])
        call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_1[6])
    else
        if ( Trig_Remove_Wards_Func006Func002C() ) then
            call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[0])
            call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[1])
            call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[2])
            call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[3])
            call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[4])
            call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[5])
            call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_2[6])
        else
            if ( Trig_Remove_Wards_Func006Func002Func002C() ) then
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[0])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[1])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[2])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[3])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[4])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[5])
                call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_3[6])
            else
                if ( Trig_Remove_Wards_Func006Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[0])
                    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[1])
                    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[2])
                    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[3])
                    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[4])
                    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[5])
                    call RemoveUnit(udg_LB_BeamUnit_4[6])
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_Remove_Wards_Func007C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Wards)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ward_Damage)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ward_Stand_in_middle)
        call KillSoundWhenDoneBJ(udg_LB_FireLoop)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_LB_CenterFlame)
        set udg_WardsBoolean2=false
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[4])
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB_Grunt, 60.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkCaster.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 3.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Birth")
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.70)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Spell Slam")
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.40)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Explosion)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remove_Wards takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remove_Wards=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_Wards, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_Wards, Condition(function Trig_Remove_Wards_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Wards, function Trig_Remove_Wards_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ward Stand in middle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ward_Stand_in_middle_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center, udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_WardsBoolean2 == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ward_Stand_in_middle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ward_Stand_in_middle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ward_Stand_in_middle=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ward_Stand_in_middle)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Ward_Stand_in_middle, 0.10)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ward_Stand_in_middle, Condition(function Trig_Ward_Stand_in_middle_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ward_Stand_in_middle, function Trig_Ward_Stand_in_middle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ArmageddonBoolean=true
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[4])
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Spell Channel")
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Fountain of Souls.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    set udg_LB_ArmageddonEffect=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Meteors)
    set udg_LB_ArmageddonFrequency=0.50
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_ArmageddonTimer, false, 0.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB_Hope, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Armageddon, "udg_LB_CastSpells", EQUAL, 6.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon, function Trig_Armageddon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon Meteors
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Meteors_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_LB_ArmageddonFrequency <= 0.05 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Meteors_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_LB_ArmageddonLoc[udg_LB_I2], udg_TempLocation[1]) <= 250.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Meteors_Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_LB_I1 == udg_LB_I2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Meteors_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_LB_I1=( udg_LB_I1 + 1 )
    set udg_LB_ArmageddonLoc[udg_LB_I1]=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Boss_Field)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_LB_ArmageddonLoc[udg_LB_I1], "war3mapImported\\Rain of Fire III.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 2.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_LB_ArmageddonLoc[udg_LB_I1], "war3mapImported\\CallDown_4.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.40)
    set udg_LB_Marker[udg_LB_I1]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    if ( Trig_Armageddon_Meteors_Func010C() ) then
    else
        set udg_LB_ArmageddonFrequency=( udg_LB_ArmageddonFrequency - 0.01 )
    endif
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_ArmageddonTimer, false, udg_LB_ArmageddonFrequency)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_LB_I2=( udg_LB_I2 + 1 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_LB_Marker[udg_LB_I2])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Invisibility\\InvisibilityTarget.mdl")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    if ( Trig_Armageddon_Meteors_Func020C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_LB_ArmageddonLoc[udg_LB_I2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    if ( Trig_Armageddon_Meteors_Func023C() ) then
        set udg_LB_I1=0
        set udg_LB_I2=0
    else
    endif
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 3.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon_Meteors takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon_Meteors=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Armageddon_Meteors, udg_LB_ArmageddonTimer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon_Meteors, function Trig_Armageddon_Meteors_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fire Ward
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fire_Ward_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Ward_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_BossfightON[4] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Ward_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_WardsBoolean=true
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB___Laugh_2, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_Bosses[4])
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Morph")
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses[4])
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkCaster_Portrait.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 3.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.70)
    if ( Trig_Fire_Ward_Func013C() ) then
        call ShowUnitHide(udg_Bosses[4])
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.70)
    if ( Trig_Fire_Ward_Func015C() ) then
        set udg_FL_FW_MissileFrequency=0.60
        set udg_FL_FW_RotateSpeed=1.00
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Missiles)
        set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00A', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_TempLocation[1], 90.00)
        set udg_Ward[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitScalePercent(udg_Ward[6], 200.00, 200.00, 200.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkCaster_Portrait.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(udg_Ward[6], 500)
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_Ward[6], 100)
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_FW_RotateTimer, false, 0.00)
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_FW_FireMissileTimer, false, 1.00)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fire_Ward takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fire_Ward=CreateTrigger()
    call h__TriggerRegisterVariableEvent(gg_trg_Fire_Ward, "udg_LB_CastSpells", EQUAL, 7.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fire_Ward, function Trig_Fire_Ward_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Rotate Fire Ward
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Rotate_Fire_Ward_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_FL_FW_RotateSpeed <= 15.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rotate_Fire_Ward_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[6])
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Ward[6], udg_TempLocation[1], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[6]) + udg_FL_FW_RotateSpeed ))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    if ( Trig_Rotate_Fire_Ward_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_FL_FW_RotateSpeed=( udg_FL_FW_RotateSpeed + 0.01 )
    else
    endif
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_FW_RotateTimer, false, 0.03)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rotate_Fire_Ward takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rotate_Fire_Ward=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Rotate_Fire_Ward, udg_LB_FW_RotateTimer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Rotate_Fire_Ward, function Trig_Rotate_Fire_Ward_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Missiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Missiles_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_FL_FW_MissileFrequency <= 0.10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Missiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Ward[6])
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 100.00, GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[6]))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00K', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Bosses[4]), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(udg_Ward[6]))
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_LB_MissilesGroup)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    if ( Trig_Spawn_Missiles_Func009C() ) then
    else
        set udg_FL_FW_MissileFrequency=( udg_FL_FW_MissileFrequency - 0.01 )
    endif
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_FW_FireMissileTimer, false, udg_FL_FW_MissileFrequency)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Missiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Missiles=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Spawn_Missiles, udg_LB_FW_FireMissileTimer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Missiles, function Trig_Spawn_Missiles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Missiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Missiles_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_LB_MissilesGroup) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Missiles_Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_TempLocation[1], udg_TempLocation[3]) <= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Missiles_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    set udg_TempLocation[2]=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], 15.00, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    set udg_TempLocation[3]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Hero)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(GetEnumUnit(), udg_TempLocation[2], GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit()))
    if ( Trig_Move_Missiles_Func001Func005C() ) then
        call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_LB_MissilesGroup)
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[3], udg_Hero, 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[2])
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[3])
endfunction

function Trig_Move_Missiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_LB_MissilesGroup, function Trig_Move_Missiles_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Missiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Missiles=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Missiles)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Move_Missiles, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Move_Missiles, Condition(function Trig_Move_Missiles_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Missiles, function Trig_Move_Missiles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Missiles Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Missiles_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Missiles_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_LB_MissilesGroup)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Missiles_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Missiles_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Missiles_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Missiles_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Missiles_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Missiles_Dies, function Trig_Missiles_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fire Ward Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fire_Ward_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Ward[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Ward_Dies_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Ward_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_LB_FW_FireMissileTimer)
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_LB_FW_RotateTimer)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_Missiles)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_LB_MissilesGroup, function Trig_Fire_Ward_Dies_Func006A)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call ShowUnitShow(udg_Bosses[4])
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Boss_Fight_Center)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB_Grunt, 60.00, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_TempLocation[1], 270.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\BlinkCaster.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 3.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Birth")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.70)
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_Bosses[4], "Spell Slam")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.40)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Explosion)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fire_Ward_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fire_Ward_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Fire_Ward_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Fire_Ward_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Fire_Ward_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fire_Ward_Dies, function Trig_Fire_Ward_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LB Auto Missiles Enter Region 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WardsBoolean == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_LB_AutoMissileRegion=gg_rct_Boss_Upper_Left
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_AutoMissileTimer, false, 10.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_1, gg_rct_Boss_Upper_Left)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_1, Condition(function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_1, function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LB Auto Missiles Enter Region 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WardsBoolean == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_LB_AutoMissileRegion=gg_rct_Boss_Lower_Left
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_AutoMissileTimer, false, 10.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_2, gg_rct_Boss_Lower_Left)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_2, Condition(function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_2, function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LB Auto Missiles Enter Region 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WardsBoolean == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_LB_AutoMissileRegion=gg_rct_Boss_Lower_Right
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_AutoMissileTimer, false, 10.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_3=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_3, gg_rct_Boss_Lower_Right)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_3, Condition(function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_3_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_3, function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LB Auto Missiles Enter Region 4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_4_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WardsBoolean == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_LB_AutoMissileRegion=gg_rct_Boss_Upper_Right
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_AutoMissileTimer, false, 10.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_4=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_4, gg_rct_Boss_Upper_Right)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_4, Condition(function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_4_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_4, function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Enter_Region_4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LB Auto Missiles Leave Regions
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_WardsBoolean == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Hero ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_LB_AutoMissileTimer)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions, gg_rct_Boss_Upper_Left)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions, gg_rct_Boss_Lower_Left)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions, gg_rct_Boss_Lower_Right)
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions, gg_rct_Boss_Upper_Right)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions, Condition(function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions, function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Leave_Regions_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LB Auto Missiles Timer Expires
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Timer_Expires_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(udg_LB_AutoMissileRegion, udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Timer_Expires_Func025C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(udg_LB_AutoMissileRegion, udg_Hero) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Timer_Expires_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(udg_LB_AutoMissileRegion)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\CallDown_4.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.50)
    set udg_LB_AutoMissileEffect=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.80)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(udg_LB_AutoMissileRegion)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "war3mapImported\\Kingdom Come.mdx")
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectYaw(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), GetRandomDirectionDeg())
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ(gg_snd_LB_ImpactSound, 100, udg_TempLocation[1], 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer(Player(0), 10.00)
    set udg_TempLocation[1]=GetRectCenter(udg_LB_AutoMissileRegion)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_TempLocation[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Invisibility\\InvisibilityTarget.mdl")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_TempLocation[1])
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectScale(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0.00)
    call BlzSetSpecialEffectAlpha(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ(), 0)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_LB_AutoMissileEffect)
    if ( Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Timer_Expires_Func021C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Bosses[4], udg_Hero, 600.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.00)
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer(Player(0))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Timer_Expires_Func025C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_LB_AutoMissileTimer, false, 1.00)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Timer_Expires takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Timer_Expires=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Timer_Expires, udg_LB_AutoMissileTimer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LB_Auto_Missiles_Timer_Expires, function Trig_LB_Auto_Missiles_Timer_Expires_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function RunInitializationTriggers takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Damage_Engine_Config)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Unit_Indexer)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Intro_Cinematic)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Make_Quests)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Preloading)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Respawn_Initialization)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Mouse_Movement_Configuration)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spawn_Skeletons_1)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Set_Gem_Puzzle_Variables)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Spawn_Bosses)
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Players
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitCustomPlayerSlots takes nothing returns nothing

    // Player 0
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(0), 0)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(0), ConvertPlayerColor(0))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(0), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(0), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(0), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

endfunction

function InitCustomTeams takes nothing returns nothing
    // Force: TRIGSTR_077
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(0), 0)

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Main Initialization
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
function main takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraBounds(- 11520.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), - 11776.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM), 11520.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), 11264.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), - 11520.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), 11264.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), 11520.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), - 11776.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM))
    call SetDayNightModels("Environment\\DNC\\DNCUnderground\\DNCUndergroundTerrain\\DNCUndergroundTerrain.mdl", "Environment\\DNC\\DNCUnderground\\DNCUndergroundUnit\\DNCUndergroundUnit.mdl")
    call SetTerrainFogEx(0, 200.0, 3250.0, 0.500, 0.039, 0.000, 0.039)
    call SetWaterBaseColor(0, 0, 0, 255)
    call NewSoundEnvironment("Default")
    call SetAmbientDaySound("DungeonDay")
    call SetAmbientNightSound("DungeonNight")
    call SetMapMusic("Music", true, 0)
    call InitSounds()
    call CreateRegions()
    call CreateCameras()
    call CreateAllDestructables()
    call CreateAllUnits()
    call InitBlizzard()

call ExecuteFunc("jasshelper__initstructs33165843")
call ExecuteFunc("DamageEngine__Init")

    call InitGlobals()
    call InitCustomTriggers()
    call RunInitializationTriggers()

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Map Configuration
//*
//***************************************************************************

function config takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetMapName("TRIGSTR_003")
    call SetMapDescription("TRIGSTR_005")
    call SetPlayers(1)
    call SetTeams(1)
    call SetGamePlacement(MAP_PLACEMENT_USE_MAP_SETTINGS)

    call DefineStartLocation(0, - 1344.0, - 6400.0)

    // Player setup
    call InitCustomPlayerSlots()
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(0), 0) // INLINED!!
endfunction
